Element.Translation: Yellow Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with black caution stripes.
Element.Original: Yellow Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with black caution stripes.

Element.Translation: multiplica a quantidade de itens nas pilhas de loot. utilize valores inferiores a 1 para menos e 0 para nenhum
Element.Original: multiply amount of items in a loot stack. use values smaller 1 for less and 0 for none

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Heptágono blindado com faixa de segurança amarela

These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: $RESOURCES Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close the Factory\'s Internal Inventory. (Used for placing the necessary materials for recipes)
Element.Original: $RESOURCES Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close the Factory's Internal Inventory. (Used for placing the necessary materials for recipes)

Element.Translation: Moves fleet to a specific location.
Element.Original: Moves fleet to a specific location.

Element.Translation: A Frota ficará ociosa. Ela não atacará os inimigos.
Element.Original: Fleet will idle. It will not attack enemies.

Element.Translation: Reduz o tempo necessário para produzir um bloco
Element.Original: Decreases the time needed to produce a block.

Element.Translation: Um lingote encravado de Jisper refinado.
Element.Original: An wedged ingot of refined Jisper.

Element.Translation: Tries to move to target sector and attack enemy ships. For the time being, only loaded sectors can be attacked. The Fleet will wait outside the target sector otherwise.
Element.Original: Tries to move to target sector and attack enemy ships. For the time being, only loaded sectors can be attacked. The Fleet will wait outside the target sector otherwise.

Element.Translation: Aumenta a força do seu Scanner.
Element.Original: Increases the strength of your Scanner.

Element.Translation: Cannot take block\nStructure is not minable
Element.Original: Cannot take block\nStructure is not minable

Element.Translation: Faction owned station not salvagable\nDestroy faction block first
Element.Original: Faction owned station not salvagable\nDestroy faction block first

Element.Translation: Used by players to create their own shops that they can stock with blocks and/or items and open to the public or keep restricted to specific faction ranks. The prices of each block may be set here, as well as the quantities desired.
Element.Original: Used by players to create their own shops that they can stock with blocks and/or items and open to the public or keep restricted to specific faction ranks. The prices of each block may be set here, as well as the quantities desired.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: quanto um objeto desacelerará naturalmente (precisa ser entre 0 e 1): 0 é sem desaceleração
Element.Original: how much object slow down naturally (must be between 0 and 1): 0 is no slowdown

Element.Translation: Quanto tempo para uma frota não carregada atravessar um setor em ms
Element.Original: How long for an unloaded fleet to cross a sector in ms

Element.Translation: Unable to dock ship to shipyard!
Element.Original: Unable to dock ship to shipyard!

Element.Translation: A ship with this name already exists!
Element.Original: A ship with this name already exists!

Element.Translation: Insira um nome para este projeto!
Element.Original: Enter a name for this design!

Element.Translation: Construction interrupted!\nOriginal Ship name already exists!
Element.Original: Construction interrupted!\nOriginal Ship name already exists!

Element.Translation: Cannot construct! Design is overlapping with another structure!
Element.Original: Cannot construct! Design is overlapping with another structure!

Element.Translation: Projeto da nave (%s)\n(clique com o botão direito para visualizar)
ERROR\nYou don\'t have that many!\nYou can only sell %s...
Element.Original: ERROR\nYou don't have that many!\nYou can only sell %s...

Element.Translation: A loja esgotou sua capacidade de\narmazenamento para este item!
Element.Original: Shop cannot stock any\nmore of that item!

Element.Translation: ERROR\nLimited shop demand!\nYou can only sell %s...
Element.Original: ERROR\nLimited shop demand!\nYou can only sell %s...

Element.Translation:
Ship %s
used a block type that is not allowed on space stations:
%s
It will be removed!
Element.Original:
Ship %s
used a block type that is not allowed on space stations:
%s
It will be removed!

Element.Translation:
Ship %s
used a block type that is not allowed on space stations:
%s
It will be removed!
Element.Original:
Ship %s
used a block type that is not allowed on space stations:
%s
It will be removed!

Element.Translation: Invalid station. A station can\'t be docked and will be removed.
Element.Original: Invalid station. A station can't be docked and will be removed.

Element.Translation: Invalid station. A station can\'t be docked and will be removed.
Element.Original: Invalid station. A station can't be docked and will be removed.

Element.Translation:
The blocks on this station are
worn and decayed!
You can only salvage scrap!
(press %s on the station to repair)
Element.Original:
The blocks on this station are
worn and decayed!
You can only salvage scrap!
(press %s on the station to repair)

Element.Translation: Target doesn\'t seem to take any damage!
Element.Original: Target doesn't seem to take any damage!

Element.Translation: Reduces the drain on your shields when using a transporter.
Element.Original: Reduces the drain on your shields when using a transporter.

Element.Translation: Este é um projeto de nave. Projetos podem ser utilizados no estaleiro para carregar uma projeção virtual de uma nave. A projeção pode ser editada no modo criativo.\nOs projetos podem ser convertidos em naves de verdade ao se prover os recursos necessários.
Element.Original: This is a ship design. Designs are used in shipyards to load a virtual projection on a ship. The projection can be edited in creative mode.\nDesigns can then be made into a real ship by providing the resources.

Element.Translation: Experimente as armas\npessoais por quanto precisar, e então\nfale com o NPC-05 para sua última lição
Element.Original: Try out the personal guns\nas long as you like, and then\ntalk to NPC-05 for you last lesson

Element.Translation: Nome do jogador dentro do jogo:
By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation:
Se você tiver problemas com o encaixe,
encaixe um único núcleo, e então construia nele
a partir da sua posição já encaixada para entender
completamente como o sistema de encaixe funciona.
Se você construir uma nave já encaixada, desencaixar
e encaixar novamente pode mudar sua posição.
Element.Original:
If you have problems with docking,
dock a single core, and then build on
it from its docked position to fully
understand how the docking area system works.
If you build on a docked ship, un-docking
and re-docking might change its position.

Element.Translation:
Para docar, selecione o raio da doca (o qual também
ativa portas e outros blocos ativáveis)
e dispare no bloco de trilho.
Clique direito irá ignorar portas para que você possa docar
 ao invés de fechar elas.
Element.Original:
To dock, select the docking beam (which also
activates doors and other activatable blocks)
and shoot it on the docking block.
Right click will ignore doors so you can dock
without closing them instead.

Element.Translation:
Uma nave está acoplada no centro relativo
 a seu tamanho. O núcleo da nave aparecerá logo acima da porta
 de acoplamento e todas as suas partes externas precisam caber na área verde.
Uma torre precisa ter seu núcleo na parte inferior.
Isso significa que você não pode construir sob
 o núcleo se você pretende utilizá-lo como uma torre.
Element.Original:
A ship is docked at the centre relative to
its size. The ship core will appear right above the docking port
and all parts sticking out must fit in the green area.
A turret needs to have its core on the bottom.
That means you cannot build below
the core if you want to use it as a turret.

Element.Translation:
Você pode aumentar o tamanho da área
ligando o intensificador de doca à ele.
Somente aperte $SELECT_MODULE no módulo
de doca e coloque alguns intensificadores.
O tamanho é determinado pela forma de
seus intensificadores. Eles devem ser colocados em grupos conectados.
Element.Original:
You can increase the size of the area
by linking docking enhancer blocks to it.
Just press $SELECT_MODULE on the docking
module and place down some enhancers.
The size is determined by the shape of
its enhancers. They must be placed in connecting groups.

Element.Translation:
Quando colocado, você poderá ver a área de
docagem. Caso não esteja verde, então algo está
bloqueando-o. A área de doca deve estar completamente
livre de qualquer outro bloco.
Element.Original:
When it is placed down, you should see the docking
area. If it is not green, then something is
blocking it. A docking area must be completely
free from any block.

Element.Translation:
Para acoplar, você precisa de um "módulo fixo de ancoragem",
ou um "módulo para ancoragem de torres". Ao posicioná-la,
você pode alterar sua orientação
 por meio do módulo de construção avançado.
Element.Original:
To dock, you need a "fixed docking module",
or a "turret docking module". When placing it
down, you can change its orientation in the
advanced build mode.

Element.Translation: Increases the strength of your Thrust Blast.
Element.Original: Increases the strength of your Thrust Blast.

Element.Translation: Bem vindo ao Tutorial de tripulação IA.\nNeste tutorial explicaremos como adquirir\ne controlar sua tripulação IA
Element.Original: Welcome to the AI Crew Tutorial.\nThis tutorial explains how to get\nand control your AI crew

Element.Translation: Você também pode docar múltiplas naves em cadeia\njuntas, mas você não pode docar nada\nem uma torre ainda.
Element.Original: You can also chain-dock multiple ships\ntogether, but you cannot dock anything\non a turret yet.

Element.Translation:
Para torres serem controladas por IA,
você precisa ter a torre identificada com um bloco de facção
e também equipa-la com um módulo de IA.
Aperte $ACTIVATE nele para ter certeza que está ativado como "torre",
então você pode ou ativa-la ali, ou fazer a mesma coisa
 pelo painel da estrutura.
Element.Original:
For turrets to be AI controlled,
you have to have the turret factioned with
the faction block and also equip it with an AI Module.
Press $ACTIVATE on it to make sure it is set to 'turret',
then you can either activate it there, or do the same
from the structure panel.

Element.Translation: Enter mine arm timer in seconds. Use -1 for manual arming
Element.Original: Enter mine arm timer in seconds. Use -1 for manual arming

Element.Translation: segundos até que os asteroides presentes em um setor completamente minerado sejam renovados (-1 = nunca)
Element.Original: seconds until a sector that is mined down to 0 asteroids is replenished (-1 = never)

Element.Translation:
Saudações, viajante espacial!

Meu nome é %s. Eu sou membro da %s
e estou sob ordens de %s na facção: %s.
Element.Original:
Greetings space traveller!

My name is %s, I'm currently part of %s,
and under the command of %s in the faction: %s.

Element.Translation: An advanced circuit that\'s manufactured from Hattel crystals.
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Hattel crystals.

Element.Translation: Impossível colar!\nO template é muito grande\npara este servidor.
Element.Original: Cannot paste!\nTemplate size is too big\nfor this server.

Element.Translation: Você não pode ter mais tripulação!
Quero você fora da minha equipe. Fique onde está!
Element.Original: I want you off my team. Stay where you are!

Element.Translation: Rampa de armadura básica cinza escura
ERRO\nSomente um bloco de Inteligência Artificial\né permitido por estrutura.
Element.Original: ERROR\nOnly one AI block is permitted\nper structure.

Element.Translation: ERRO\nSomente um bloco de Facção\né permitido por estrutura.
Element.Original: ERROR\nOnly one Faction block is permitted\nper structure.

Element.Translation: ERRO\nSomente um bloco de Loja\né permitido por estrutura.
Element.Original: ERROR\nOnly one Core block is permitted\nper structure.

Element.Translation: Sinto-me honrado em trabalhar com você, comandante!
Element.Original: I'm honoured to work with you, commander!

Element.Translation: ERRO\nSomente um bloco de Loja\né permitido por estrutura.
Element.Original: ERROR\nOnly one Shop block is permitted\nper structure.

Element.Translation: Aviso: %s conexões dos módulos ignoradas\ndevido a blocos sobrepostos.
Element.Original: Warning: %s module connections\nignored due to overlapping blocks.

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Green Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with white caution stripes.
Element.Original: Green Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with white caution stripes.
Do you really want to do this?

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Esta estrutura não possui\ndepósitos com nome.

The file (./data/sphereExplosionData.zip) seems to be corrupted.\nMaybe something downloaded wrongly.\nBest to force a reinstall from the launcher (make sure to save your \'server-database\' and \'blueprints\' folder if you fully uninstall to keep your worlds)
Element.Original: The file (./data/sphereExplosionData.zip) seems to be corrupted.\nMaybe something downloaded wrongly.\nBest to force a reinstall from the launcher (make sure to save your 'server-database' and 'blueprints' folder if you fully uninstall to keep your worlds)

Element.Translation: Chance por bloco de colocar uma nova veia de recurso (1.0 = 100%)
Element.Original: Chance per block to place a new resource vein (1.0 = 100%)

Element.Translation: Câmara de Reator para melhorar as capacidades de reconhecimento.\n\rPrecisa estar fisicamente conectada a um Reator de Energia usando blocos de Conduíte de Reator.
Element.Original: Reactor Chamber to enhance recon capabilities.\n\rNeeds to be physically connected with a Power Reactor by using Reactor Conduit blocks.

Element.Translation: Isso conclui o tutorial de de tripulação IA. \n Obrigado por ler, e obrigado por jogar\nStarmade!
Element.Original: This concludes the AI Crew Tutorial.\nThanks for reading, and thanks for playing\nStarMade!

Element.Translation: Detached Mouse From Game. Click to reattach.
Element.Original: Detached Mouse From Game. Click to reattach.

Element.Translation: Impossível alterar as permissões\ndo papel de um administrador!
Element.Original: Cannot modify rights\nof an admin role!

Element.Translation: Impossível alterar as permissões\ndo papel de um administrador!
Element.Original: Cannot modify rights\nof an admin role!

Element.Translation: Impossível alterar as permissões\ndo papel de um administrador!
Element.Original: Cannot modify rights\nof an admin role!

Element.Translation: Impossível alterar as permissões\ndo papel de um administrador!
Element.Original: Cannot modify rights\nof an admin role!

Element.Translation: An advanced circuit that\'s manufactured from Nocx crystals.
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Nocx crystals.

Element.Translation: Blocos de luz são uma maneira excelente de prover iluminação para a área.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: Incoming trade request from:\n%s\nPress %s to accept, %s to cancel
Element.Original: Incoming trade request from:\n%s\nPress %s to accept, %s to cancel

Element.Translation: WARNING: Low thrust to do blast!
Element.Original: WARNING: Low thrust to do blast!

Element.Translation: The BOBBY AI Module is a capable of providing basic and rudimentary automation and functions. Useful for building automated turrets, amongst a few other applications. It can be configured by opening up your Menu (Inventory, Weapons, Shop,Navigation), and looking for the AI Config button on the bottom right. Press $ACTIVATE to Activate/Deactivate.
Element.Original: The BOBBY AI Module is a capable of providing basic and rudimentary automation and functions. Useful for building automated turrets, amongst a few other applications. It can be configured by opening up your Menu (Inventory, Weapons, Shop,Navigation), and looking for the AI Config button on the bottom right. Press $ACTIVATE to Activate/Deactivate.

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: All entries are no longer enemy usable!
Element.Original: All entries are no longer enemy usable!
When put right next to a Mine Core, it turns the mine into a long range lock-on missile launcher.\n\rFires constantly and dies when hit by a weapon or a ship.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Dependendo do que você pretender fazer,\ndefina a sua AI para \'nave\' ou \'torre\'.\nAs torres não utilizarão os propulsores.
Element.Original: Depending on what you want to use it for,\nset your AI to 'ship' or 'turret'. Turrets will\nnot use their thrusters.

Element.Translation:
A melhor maneira de operar AIs é
estando em uma facção, assim as
AIs sabem exatamente quem seus inimigos são.
Eles também funcionam sem uma facção.
Element.Original:
The best way to operate AI is
to be in a faction, as then the
AI knows exactly who your enemies are.
They function without a faction too.

Element.Translation: Para ativar a AI, você deve marcar \'Activate\'.\nRe-entrar naquele núcleo da nave vai desativar a AI!
Element.Original: To activate the AI, you have to tick off 'Activate'.\nRe-entering that ship core will disable the AI!

Element.Translation: Green Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with white caution stripes.
Element.Original: Green Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with white caution stripes.

Element.Translation:
Em seguida, você pode ajustar seu comportamento.
Aim at 'Any' significa que vai atacar qualquer inimigo no alcance.
Aim at 'Selected Target' só é relevante para torres
e significa que estas irão atacar a entidade selecionada, o
piloto da nave mãe seleciona uma entidade com '$SELECT_LOOK_ENTITY'
Element.Original:
Next, you can set their behaviour.
Aim at 'Any' means it will attack any enemy in range.
Aim at 'Selected Target' is only relevant for turrets
and means that those will attack the targeted entity, the
pilot of the mother ship selects an entity with '$SELECT_LOOK_ENTITY'

Element.Translation: StarMade oferece dois modos para IA\nneste momento: nave e torre. Mais\nfunções serão adicionadas.
Element.Original: StarMade offers two modes for AI\nat this moment: Ship and Turret. More\nfunctions will be added.

Element.Translation:
Você pode mudar as configurações
do AI module pressionando
'$ACTIVATE' nele.
Um painel com todas as opções vai aparecer.
Element.Original:
You can change the settings of
the AI module by pressing
'$ACTIVATE' on it.
A panel with all the options will appear.

Element.Translation:
Para construir uma nave controlada por
Inteligência Artificial, você deve colocar um AI module
 nela.
Uma estrutura pode ter apenas UM AI Module,
então tenha certeza que está bem protegido.
Element.Original:
To build an AI controlled ship,
you have to place down an AI module
on it.
A structure can only have ONE AI Module,
so make sure it's protected well.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation:
Você também pode fazer isso do conforto de sua
nave abrindo o painel de estrutura. 
Pressione $STRUCTURE_PANEL e selecione a
entidade acoplada que você quer ligar ou desligar.
Você também pode ativar/desativar todos as entidades acopladas
de uma vez no painel de estrutura.
Element.Original:
You can also do it from the comfort of your
ship by opening the structure panel.
Press $STRUCTURE_PANEL and select the
docked entity you want to turn on or off.
You can also turn on/off all docked entities at
once in the structure panel.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Um pedaço de circuito básico manufaturado a partir de cristais Nocx.
Element.Original: A basic circuit wedge that's manufactured from Nocx crystals.

Element.Translation: créditos perdidos ao morrer seriam jogados no espaço
Element.Original: drop credits lost on death into space instead

Element.Translation: Your bomb was a dud, since it wasn't activated yet.\nIt takes %s sec to become active after fire.
Element.Original: Your bomb was a dud, since it wasn't activated yet.\nIt takes %s sec to become active after fire.

Element.Translation:
Enquanto estiver segurando $BUILD_MODE_FIX_CAM ,
você pode colocar ou remover blocos
usando o cursor do seu mouse.
Explicarei agora cada uma das ferramentas...
Element.Original:
While holding $BUILD_MODE_FIX_CAM ,
you can place/remove blocks by directly clicking on blocks
with your mouse cursor.
Each tool will now be explained...

Element.Translation:
Estando no modo de construção, segure $BUILD_MODE_FIX_CAM
para ativar o modo de construção avançado.
Você verá diversas opções,
no lado direito da sua tela.
Element.Original:
While in build mode, hold down $BUILD_MODE_FIX_CAM
to activate the advanced build mode.
You will see several options
on the right side of your screen.

Element.Translation:
O modo iluminado remove os efeitos de sombra
dos blocos, iluminando áreas escuras para facilitar
a construção.
Procure desligá-lo de vez em quando para
garantir que sua nave também ficará bonita
com a iluminação natural.
Element.Original:
Lighten mode removes any shadows and
shading from the blocks, lighting
up dark areas to make it easier
to see when building. Keep in mind
to disable it once in a while to see
how good your ship looks with lighting enabled.

Element.Translation:
O modo de remoção altera a caixa de seleção de
amarela para uma vermelha, que demarca os
blocos que serão removidos.
Isto é especialmente útil para remover
grandes áreas.
Element.Original:
Remove mode turns the yellow build box
into a red one that shows you what blocks
are going to be removed.
This is especially helpful for removing
larger areas.

Element.Translation: Quartéis generais ficam vulneráveis e podem ser atacados se aos Pontos de Facção forem negativos e a facção não possuir nenhum território
Element.Original: Home bases become attackable if a faction's Faction Points are in the minus and the faction doesn't own any territory

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation:
A primeira funcionalidade útil é o botão shift esquerdo,
ele lhe permitirá mover-se muito mais rápido
(ao contrário do modo astronauta,
onde ele faz você andar mais lentamente).
Element.Original:
The first useful feature is the left shift button,
It will let you move a lot faster
(as opposed to
slower in astronaut mode).

Element.Translation: Blocos de luz são uma maneira excelente de prover iluminação para a área.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: Você somente pode acessar o modo de construção avançada\na partir do núcleo da nave ou de um bloco de construção.
Element.Original: You can only access the advanced building\nmode in a ship core or build block.

Element.Translation:
O filtro de remoção é uma ótima ferramenta para rapidamente readaptar sua nave!
Você pode selecionar um bloco da lista suspensa
(ou usar o filtro acima para procurar por nomes específicos) e apenas
o bloco selecionado será removido quando clicar com o botão direito.
Isto funciona com áreas de construção maiores e simetria.
Element.Original:
The remove filter is a great tool to quickly refit your ship!
You can select a block from the drop down menu
(or use the filter above to search for specific names) and only
the selected block will be removed when right clicking.
This works with larger build areas and symmetry.

Element.Translation:
Quando você colocar ou remover blocos
acidentalmente é possível desfazer suas
últimas ações ao clicar em 'desfazer'.
Você também pode refazer clicando em 'refazer.'.
Element.Original:
Whenever you accidentally misplaced
or deleted a block, you can undo your
last actions by clicking on 'undo'.
You can also redo by clicking on 'redo'.

Element.Translation:
As três barras de rolagem são uma das melhores
ferramentas de construção.
Elas aumentarão a área a ser construída, permitindo que vários blocos
possam ser colocados ou removidos simultaneamente.
Cada servidor pode possui um valor diferente e você pode alterar
o valor para o modo um jogador no arquivo server.cfg.
Element.Original:
The three sliders are one of the best tools
for building. They will increase the build area
so multiple blocks can be build/removed at once.
Servers have different max settings, and you
can set them for your single player game
in the server.cfg file.

Element.Translation:
O modo espelho serve para, fazer com
que o modo de simetria também espelhe
a orientação dos blocos, como, por
exemplo, armas e etc...
Element.Original:
Mirror mode basically just tells
symmetry mode to also mirror
blocks that can be orientated
like weapons, etc...

Element.Translation:
Planos de simetria são provavelmente a melhor ferramenta do jogo.
Você coloca 'paredes' que dividem sua estrutura em partes.
Colocar um bloco em um lado também o colocará no outro.
O modo de simetria 'ímpar' irá mover este muro para o
meio de um bloco.
Você pode utilizar diversos planos de simetria para agilizar
o seu trabalho.
Element.Original:
Symmetry planes are probably the best tools in the game.
You place down 'walls' that divide your structure in parts.
Placing a block on one side will also place the
block on the other side. 'odd' symmetry just lets you
move the wall to the middle of a block.
You can use multiple symmetry planes to
maximize your building speed.

Element.Translation: Fragmentos cintilantes de Sintyr refletem tanta luz que eles até parecem brilhar. Várias tecnologias são baseadas no uso destes fragmentos após seu refino.
Element.Original: Glittering Sintyr Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: Conduit must connect \'one reactor <-> one chamber\' or \'one chamber <-> one chamber\'
Element.Original: Conduit must connect 'one reactor <-> one chamber' or 'one chamber <-> one chamber'

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: O núcleo da nave é importante, entendi!
Element.Original: The Ship Core is important, got it!

Element.Translation: Do you really want to remove the \'enemy usable\' for all entries?
Element.Original: Do you really want to remove the 'enemy usable' for all entries?

Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: The system design in this world really matters.\nFor example, if you set up power in the right way, you can get a huge recharge bonus.

Element.Translation: The Astrotech Module, when used in conjunction with an Astrotech Computer, can create a basic but effective repair system. The Astrotech Module fires a repair beam in a straight line. Astrotech Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their repair speed. You can also choose which block outputs the beam by finding the Astrotech Module you want to output the beam, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it. AstroTech Modules can used to repair damage to blocks.
Element.Original: The Repair Beam Module, when used in conjunction with a Repair Beam Computer, can create a basic but effective repair system. The Astrotech Module fires a repair beam in a straight line. Astrotech Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their repair speed. You can also choose which block outputs the beam by finding the Astrotech Module you want to output the beam, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it. AstroTech Modules can used to repair damage to blocks.

Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Original: Macet Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.

Element.Translation: This block can only be seen in the structure\'s build mode. It connects to the Trigger (Area) Controller. Use it to build areas that activate when someone enters it. On activation, only one signal is sent. It will not activate again, until the catalyst leaves the area. It will activate once for each object, should multiple objects enter the area.
Element.Original: This block can only be seen in the structure's build mode. It connects to the Trigger (Area) Controller. Use it to build areas that activate when someone enters it. On activation, only one signal is sent. It will not activate again, until the catalyst leaves the area. It will activate once for each object, should multiple objects enter the area.

Element.Translation: Acelera o tempo que leva para aplicar uma alteração na configuração de empuxo.
Element.Original: Speeds up how long it takes to apply a change to your thrust configuration.

Element.Translation: The Cannon Computer is required for creating functioning Cannon systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Cannon Barrels, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Cannon Barrels using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Cannon Barrel. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
Element.Original: The Cannon Computer is required for creating functioning Cannon systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Cannon Barrels, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Cannon Barrels using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Cannon Barrel. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

It is capable of controlling any amount of Damage Pulse Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Damage Pulse Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Damage Pulse Modules. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
Element.Original: The Damage Pulse Computer is required for creating functioning Damage Pulse systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Damage Pulse Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Damage Pulse Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Damage Pulse Modules. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
I want to know something else

Element.Translation:
Os piratas são as pragas do universo.
É melhor não atacá-los a não ser que absolutamente necessário. Use seu navegador para rastrear inimigos.
Há rumores de que eles constroem suas próprias bases e até copiam diagramas de naves,
mas somente alguns poucos sobreviveram para contar história.

Você pode fugir dos piratas e normalmente eles param de te perseguir se você conseguir 1 ou 2 setores de distância deles.
Element.Original:
The pirates are the pest of the universe.
It's better to not engage then unless you absolutely must. Use your navigator often to check for hostiles.
There are rumors that they build their own bases, and even copy ship blueprints,
but only few have survived to tell the story. 

You can outrun the pirates and they usually stop pursuing if you get 1-2 sector clicks away.

Element.Translation: Blocos de luz são uma maneira excelente de prover iluminação para a área.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation:
A associação do comércio é a maior companhia de comércio do universo conhecido.
Em suas viagens você provavelmente irá nos encontrar em uma ou outra zona.
Nós possuímos lojas onde compramos e vendemos diversos itens, mas também temos
uma frota para nos defender
e reabastecer nossas lojas.

Somos inicialmente neutros, porém, retornaremos fogo caso você atire contra nossas lojas, ou se tentar perfurar os escudos de nossas naves. Mas não se preocupe: Não ficaremos furiosos com você por muito tempo, caso sobreviva.
Element.Original:
The traiding guild is the biggest trading company of the known universe.
On your travels you will probably encounter us in one or another way.
We have shops where we buy and sell various goods, but we also utilize a fleet to restock
shops, and defend ourselves. 

While we are by priciple neutral, we will respond if you fire at our shops, or breach the shields
of our vessels. But don't worry: we won't be mad at you for long should you survive.

Element.Translation: Informações do Servidor / Lista de Jogadores
Quero saber mais sobre a associação do comércio
Element.Original: I want to know more about the traiding guild

Element.Translation:
Saudações, viajante do espaço.

Meu nome é %s e eu sou um membro da associação do comércio intergalático.
Você pode obter informações, missões e mais.

Como posso ajudá-lo?
Element.Original:
Greetings, space traveler.

My name is %s, and I'm a member of the intergalactic traiding Guild.
You can get information, quests, and more.

How can I help you?

Element.Translation: Quantos grupos de simulação podem estar presentes no universo ao mesmo tempo (desempenho)
Element.Original: How many simulation groups may be in the universe simultaniously (performance)
I want to know something else

Element.Translation: Quero saber mais sobre as lojas
Element.Original: I want to know more about shops

Element.Translation:
Esta é uma loja mais avançada.
As versões mais simples das lojas não são tripuladas por membros da associação do comércio,
elas utilizam um sistema totalmente automático de vendas. Você inclusive pode comprar o seu
bloco de loja aqui, para utilizar a mesma tecnologia nas lojas da sua própria estação

Aqui você também pode comprar diagramas variados.
Tanto para criar um bloco quanto para modificá-los.

 Fique a vontade para dar uma olhadinha (pressione 'B' depois que esta conversa terminar)
Element.Original:
This is an advaced shop.
The more common version of shops are not manned by member of the trading guild,
but utilize a fully automatic shop system. You can also buy your own shopping block right here,
to use the same technique on your own stations

Here you can also buy recipes for various purposes. Either to create a block, or a fixed recipe
to convert blocks. 

Feel free to browse (press 'B' after this converation has ended)
I want to know something else

Changes your shield density to take less damage from high damage weapons.

Tenha sempre em mente que você só pode colocar UM recurso

Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;Start
Element.Translation:
Bem-vindo ao Tutorial da Facção.
Esse tutorial explicará como administrar
sua facção e como manter sua sede e naves
seguras de jogadores.
Element.Original:
Welcome to the Faction Tutorial.
This tutorial will explain how to manage
your faction and how to keep your ships and homebase
safe from players.

Element.Translation: The Damage Pulse Module, when used in conjunction with a Damage Pulse Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Damage Pulse fires an AOE field directly adjacent to the output point. Damage Pulses do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the pulse by finding the Damage Pulse Module you want to output the pulse, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.
Element.Original: The Damage Pulse Module, when used in conjunction with a Damage Pulse Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Damage Pulse fires an AOE field directly adjacent to the output point. Damage Pulses do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the pulse by finding the Damage Pulse Module you want to output the pulse, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation:
Warp Gates are a stationary structure that enables players to travel vast distances instantly. Their range is 8 systems (128 sectors). They have a permanent power cost based on their gate size and additionally a one time power cost per ship which passes through the gate. This cost is calculated on the mass of the warping ship. 

Warp Gates are constructed from a 1 block deep ring structure created from Warp Gate Modules. This must then be connected to a Warp Gate Computer. Press C on the computer, then V on the modules to link the two. Alternatively use Shift + V to mass link grouped modules.

After creating both the entry and exit gates at your target departure and destination structures, you must link the two with the Marker Beam. This handheld Support Tool is sold by Trade Guild vendors. Equipping the Marker Beam and Right Clicking on a Warp Gate Computer will “Mark” the departure structure. Left Clicking on the destination will pair the two and finalise the warp route.
Element.Original:
Warp Gates are a stationary structure that enables players to travel vast distances instantly. Their range is 8 systems (128 sectors). They have a permanent power cost based on their gate size and additionally a one time power cost per ship which passes through the gate. This cost is calculated on the mass of the warping ship. 

Warp Gates are constructed from a 1 block deep ring structure created from Warp Gate Modules. This must then be connected to a Warp Gate Computer. Press C on the computer, then V on the modules to link the two. Alternatively use Shift + V to mass link grouped modules.

After creating both the entry and exit gates at your target departure and destination structures, you must link the two with the Marker Beam. This handheld Support Tool is sold by Trade Guild vendors. Equipping the Marker Beam and Right Clicking on a Warp Gate Computer will “Mark” the departure structure. Left Clicking on the destination will pair the two and finalise the warp route.

Element.Translation: Você realmente deseja excluir esta frota?
Element.Original: Do you really want to delete this Fleet?

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Agora coloque no seu inventário de fábrica básica ou Malhas de Metal,\nou Circuitos de Cristal.
Element.Original: Now place either the Metal Meshes,\nor the Crystal Circuits in your\npersonal basic factory craft slot.

Element.Translation: Isso conclui o Tutorial de Navegação.\nObrigado por ler,\ne obrigado por jogar StarMade!
Element.Original: This concludes the Navigation Tutorial.\nThanks for reading,\nand thanks for playing StarMade!

Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Por favor, insira um\n número válido!
Não é possível conectar a si mesmo

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Por favor, insira um\n número válido!

Você realmente quer deixar esta facção?
Você será impedido de acessar qualquer nave ou estrutura que pertencer
a esta facção, exceto as naves que possuírem a Patente de Permissão Pessoal.

Se você for o último membro, esta facção será automaticamente dissolvida!
Element.Original:
Do you really want to leave this faction?
You'll be unable to access any ship/structure that belongs to this
faction except for your ships that use the Personal Permission Rank.

If you are the last member, the faction will also automatically disband!

Element.Original: Cannot save blueprint from design!\nNo design loaded!

Uma planta carnívora que atraí sua presa com uma luz bioluminescente e pegajosa.
Element.Original: A carnivorous plant that lures it's prey with bioluminescent tendrils.

Impressionante! Agora você pode entrar em seu primeiro\nnavio com \'$ENTER_SHIP\'
Element.Original: Awesome! Now you can enter your first\nship with '$ENTER_SHIP'

Element.Original: Spawn a ship with '$SPAWN_SHIP' and give it a name.\n(don't look at ground/walls because\nthe core needs space to spawn)

Element.Translation: Seconds to show context help for modules on cursor
Element.Original: Seconds to show context help for modules on cursor

Element.Translation: This module can be used to remotely activate any other module that can be activated. Press $ACTIVATE to Activate/Deactivate. You have to select it and connect it to the module (e.g. a door) for it to work. (Default: select with C, look at the door and press V.)
Element.Original: This module can be used to remotely activate any other module that can be activated. Press $ACTIVATE to Activate/Deactivate. You have to select it and connect it to the module (e.g. a door) for it to work. (Default: select with C, look at the door and press V.)

Element.Translation: Posicione um módulo de força\nem qualquer lugar de sua nave\n(Clique com botão esquerdo)
Element.Original: Place a power module\nanywhere on your ship\n(left click)

Element.Translation: Primeiro, vamos fazer com que sua nave seja capaz de voar.\nColoque o gerador e o propulsor em qualquer parte da sua nave.
Element.Original: Now let's make your ship flyable first.\nPlace the power and thruster anywhere on your ship.

Element.Translation:
Este é o modo de construção. É melhor construir neste modos,
 como você pode acelerar o movimento com o Shift da direita e 
 passar através de qualquer coisa. Você também está sempre alinhado a 
 esta nave, e claro você pode usar o modo 
 de construção avançado.
Element.Original:
This is build mode. It's best to build in this mode,
as you can accelerate movement with Right Shift, and
pass through anything. You are also always aligned to
this ship, and of course you can use the advanced
build tools.

Element.Translation:
Muito bem!
Veja que você pode salvar um diagrama a qualquer momento
no "Catálogo", comprar uma cópia dele na loja
e então criá-lo ao fornecer
os materiais necessários.
Basta pressionar '$CATALOG_PANEL' para abrir o painel do catálogo.
Você pode até importar suas próprias criações
em outros universos (servidores multijogador).
Element.Original:
Very nice!
Note, that you can save a blueprint of a ship at any time
in the 'Catalog', buy a copy of it at any shop
and then spawn it by just providing
the necessary blocks.
Just press '$CATALOG_PANEL' to open the catalog panel.
You can even bring your own creations
into other universes (multiplayer servers).

Element.Translation: Agora, adicione um módulo de\npropulsão em qualquer lugar da nave\n(clique com botão esquerdo)
Element.Original: Now, place a thruster\nmodule anywhere on your ship\n(left click)

Element.Translation:
Outro exemplo de grupos de blocos são os módulos de armas. 
Cada grupo de armas irá disparar apenas um projétil. Você pode ou ter um grande grupo, ou múltiplos 
menores. Lembre-se que você irá 
receber uma pena, dependendo de quantos grupos separados de arma você tenha.
Element.Original:
Another example for block-groups are the weapon modules.
Each group of weapons will fire one projectile.
You can either have one big group, or multiple
weaker small ones. Keep in mind that you'll
receive a penalty, depending on
how many separate weapon groups you have.

Element.Translation: Auxiliary power is volatile and will explode when destroyed.
Element.Original: Auxiliary power is volatile and will explode when destroyed.

Element.Translation: Para alguns sistemas, é mais eficiente organizar os grupos de uma certa maneira.\nO sistema de carregamento de energia usa este modo, permitindo ao jogador construir um reator mais poderoso e eficiente o possível.
Element.Original:
For some systems, it is more efficient
to arrange the groups in a certain way.
The power recharge system uses this type, allowing the player
to construct a powerful reactor as efficient as possible.

Element.Translation: Neste caso, a dimensão do grupo de blocos importa.\nIsso significa que um cubo grande e sólido de\nmódulos de recarga de energia fornecem muito menos energia do que a mesma quantidade de blocos, dispostos em uma cruz gigante e tridimensional.
Element.Original:
In this case, the dimension of the block-groups matter.
This means that a solid big cube of
recharge power modules gives a lot less energy than the same
amount of blocks, laid out in a giant three-dimensional cross.

Element.Translation: StarMade usa um sistema para rapidamente \ncalcular sistemas de nave e\n suas conexões, assim com grupos de blocos específicos.
Element.Original: StarMade uses a system to quickly\ncalculate ship systems and their\nconnections, as well as groups of a particular blocks.

Element.Translation:
Diversos sistemas trabalham melhor em grupos-blocos. 
Um grupo-blocos consiste de dois ou mais
 blocos do mesmo tipo que estão em contato um com o outro. 
Um grande cubo sólido é um exemplo de um grupo-bloco, 
 mas o mesmo vale para uma linha.
Element.Original:
A lot of systems work best in block-groups.
A block-group consists of two or more
blocks of the same type that are all touching each other.
A solid big cube of blocks is an example of a block-group,
but the same goes for a line.

Element.Translation: The Shield Drain Module, when used in conjunction with a Shield Drain Computer, can create a basic but effective shield transfer system. The Shield Drain Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Shield Drain Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Shield Drain Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.
Element.Original: The Shield Drain Module, when used in conjunction with a Shield Drain Computer, can create a basic but effective shield transfer system. The Shield Drain Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Shield Drain Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Shield Drain Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: A block of Sintyr Crystal. It\'s orange in colour and emits a soft glow.
Element.Original: A block of Sintyr Crystal. It's orange in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation: The Power Supply Computer is required for creating functioning Power Supply systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Power Supply Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Power Supply Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Power Supply Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
Element.Original: The Power Supply Computer is required for creating functioning Power Supply systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Power Supply Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Power Supply Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Power Supply Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: Um premio especial usado principalmente em mini-jogos criados pelo jogador.
Element.Original: A special prize item mainly used in player created mini-games.

Element.Translation: Blocos de luz são uma maneira excelente de prover iluminação para a área.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Proprietário da Loja: Associação do Comércio

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateE
Element.Translation: OR verificará todos os blocos que estão\nconectados a ele e dará sinal\n\'ligado\' se UM ou mais sinais recebidos forem \'ligado\'.
Element.Original: OR will look at all the blocks that are\nconnected to it and only output the 'on'\nsignal when ONE or more of the receiving signals is 'on'.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateF
Element.Translation:
Agora o bloco de DELAY.
O bloco de DELAY (atraso) obtém um sinal on/off e
envia-o assim como o bloco de ativação.
No entanto, ele não fará isto de maneira imediata,
e sim com um atraso.
Element.Original:
Now to the delay block.
The delay block takes a signal on/off and
outputs it just like the activation block.
However, it will not do this immediately
but with a delay.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateG
Element.Translation: O bloco de DELAY permite que os jogadores construam\nsistemas contínuos, como relógios, e muitos outros\ncircuitos mais complexos.
Element.Original: The delay block enables players to build\nlooped systems like clocks, and many more\ncomplex circuits.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateH
Element.Translation: Há vários sites na internet que explicam sobre\nportas lógicas básicas. Você pode reconstituí-las em StarMade.
Element.Original: There are several internet sites to look up basic\nlogic gates. You can rebuild these in StarMade.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateA
Element.Translation:
Como você deve saber, você pode ligar vários blocos
para fazer uma cadeia para controlar remotamente
o bloco no final. Você pode construir
coisas muito mais complexas que isto.
É aqui que os blocos NOT, OR, AND e DELAY
entram em cena.
Element.Original:
As you now know, you can link blocks together
to make a chain to remote control
the block at the end. You can build
a lot more complex things though.
This is where the NOT, OR, AND, and DELAY blocks
come into play.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateB
Element.Translation:
Cada um destes blocos podem ser ligados
assim como os blocos de ativação.
O bloco mais simples de entender é provavelmente o bloco NOT (NÃO).
O que ele faz é simplesmente inverter um sinal
de 'ON' para 'OFF', e vice-versa.
Element.Original:
Every one of these blocks can be linked just
like the activation blocks.
The simplest one to understand is probably the NOT block.
What it does is simply inverting an incoming signal
from 'on' to 'off' and vice versa.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateC
Element.Translation:
Os blocos mais complicados são
AND e OR.
Esses blocos precisarão de múltiplas entradas.
As entradas podem ser quaisquer blocos lógicos, até OR e AND
eles mesmos.
Element.Original:
The more complicated blocks are the
AND and OR blocks.
Those blocks will need multiple inputs.
The inputs can by any logic blocks, even OR and AND
themselves.

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_More about the logic system and its blocks;StateD
Element.Translation: AND verificará todos os blocos que estão\nconectados a ele e dará sinal\n\'ligado\' quando todos os sinais recebidos forem \'ligado\'.
Element.Original: AND will look at all the blocks that are\nconnected to it and only output the 'on'\nsignal when ALL of the receiving signals are 'on'.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Multiplicador do bônus de mineração neste Sistema:
Element.Original: Mining bonus multiplier in this System:

Element.Translation:
Warp Gates are a stationary structure that enables players to travel vast distances instantly. Their range is 8 systems (128 sectors). They have a permanent power cost based on their gate size and additionally a one time power cost per ship which passes through the gate. This cost is calculated on the mass of the warping ship. 

Warp Gates are constructed from a 1 block deep ring structure created from Warp Gate Modules. This must then be connected to a Warp Gate Computer. Press C on the computer, then V on the modules to link the two. Alternatively use Shift + V to mass link grouped modules.

After creating both the entry and exit gates at your target departure and destination structures, you must link the two with the Marker Beam. This handheld Support Tool is sold by Trade Guild vendors. Equipping the Marker Beam and Right Clicking on a Warp Gate Computer will “Mark” the departure structure. Left Clicking on the destination will pair the two and finalise the warp route.
Element.Original:
Warp Gates are a stationary structure that enables players to travel vast distances instantly. Their range is 8 systems (128 sectors). They have a permanent power cost based on their gate size and additionally a one time power cost per ship which passes through the gate. This cost is calculated on the mass of the warping ship. 

Warp Gates are constructed from a 1 block deep ring structure created from Warp Gate Modules. This must then be connected to a Warp Gate Computer. Press C on the computer, then V on the modules to link the two. Alternatively use Shift + V to mass link grouped modules.

After creating both the entry and exit gates at your target departure and destination structures, you must link the two with the Marker Beam. This handheld Support Tool is sold by Trade Guild vendors. Equipping the Marker Beam and Right Clicking on a Warp Gate Computer will “Mark” the departure structure. Left Clicking on the destination will pair the two and finalise the warp route.

Element.Translation: Localização da Estação do Proprietário do Sistema:
Escolha um Projeto a partir do inventário do estaleiro.
Element.Original: Choose a Design from shipyard inventory.

Element.Translation: Desconstrói a nave atualmente ancorada e cria um projeto dela.\nTodos os recursos da nave serão colocados aqui e nos cofres conectados.\nSe não houver espaço livre, o restante aparecerá na sua posição atual.

Desconstrói a nave atualmente ancorada.
Todos os recursos da nave serão colocados aqui e nos cofres conectados.

All resources of the ship will be placed here and in connected chests.
If there is no room, the rest will spawn at your position.
Warning: this will not create a design!

Element.Original: Collects the resources in here and in connected chests. When all resources for the design are provided, the ship will be constructed and will become yours to take.

Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Power Drain Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Power Drain Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: o projeto atual é muito grande para este estaleiro
Element.Original: current dock/design too large for this shipyard

Element.Translation:
#### Transmission Start
Target has fled...
Return to base...
#### Transmission End
Element.Original:
#### Transmission Start
Target has fled...
Return to base...
#### Transmission End

Element.Translation: Activation Gates are capable of detecting an entity passing through it\'s Gate structure, sending a True signal to any Logic block linked to the Controller.. The gate must be a solid, 1 block deep ring structure linked to a Activation Gate controller. To link your Activation Gate Controller to the Activation Gate Module structure, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Element.Original: Activation Gates are capable of detecting an entity passing through it's Gate structure, sending a True signal to any Logic block linked to the Controller.. The gate must be a solid, 1 block deep ring structure linked to a Activation Gate controller. To link your Activation Gate Controller to the Activation Gate Module structure, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.

Element.Translation: Estes Módulos podem ser usados para criar portas que podem ser abertas ou fechadas pelo jogador, feixes de ancoragem, e sistemas lógicos. Múltiplos blocos adjacentes contam como uma única porta. Significa que ativar uma ativa todas as que estão em volta dela. Muito útil para criar portas de grandes dimensões. Portas de Explosão são significativamente mais duráveis que as tradicionais portas de Plex ou Vidro. Pressione $ACTIVATE para Abrir\Fechar.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: Aumenta a distância de salto da sua Unidade de Salto.
Element.Original: Increases the jump distance of your Jump Drive.

Element.Translation: O Reator de Energia fornece uma fonte inesgotável de energia para suprir seus Capacitores de Força. A taxa de produção de energia destes geradores está diretamente ligada ao tamanho e formato de cada grupo de geradores, além do número total de módulos presentes na nave. Grupos de geradores bem projetados podem gerar energia adicional, entretanto, este bônus vai caindo progressivamente até chegar ao valor de 1 milhão. Cada módulo individual também adiciona 25 de geração de energia base por segundo. Este valor base é sempre garantido, independentemente do bônus.
Element.Original: Power Reactors provide an infinite source of power to supply your Power Capacitors. The rate at which these reactors generate energy is dependant on the specific size and layout of each group of connected modules as well as the total number of modules placed on a ship. Well designed groups of reactors may generate bonus power, although this bonus slowly declines until it reaches 1 Million power generation. Each module also adds a flat 25 power generation per second. This flat rate is always granted independantly of the bonus.

Element.Translation: Eu te ensinei tudo que sei.\nDe uma olhada ao redor da estação. Existem muitos outros NPCs aqui em volta que podem te contar\nvárias coisas úteis! Quando tiver terminado, apenas pressione ESC e aperte o botão \'Sair do Tutorial\'.
Element.Original: I've taught you everything I know.\nCheck around the station. There are still a lot of NPCs around that will tell you\nuseful information!When you are done, just hit ESC and hit the 'Exit Tutorial' button.

Element.Translation:
Esta é a última e mais importante lição: Manufatura
 é a melhor maneira de ganhar dinheiro ou de fazer coisas que você precisará para construir neste universo.

A manufatura é organizada em árvore, com recursos brutos na parte inferior. Quase todos os bloco possuem uma receita,
isto é, baseadas nestes recursos brutos. Existem dois tipos principais de matérias-primas: fragmentos de cristal e minério.
Você pode processá-los em materiais genéricos e em cápsulas: 

 - Materiais genéricos são malhas de ligas metálicas e circuitos de cristal. Eles podem ser utilizados para se fazer qualquer coisa simples.
- Materiais avançados são cápsulas. Elas são específicas e necessárias para as receitas mais avançadas.
Element.Original:
This is the last and most important lesson: Crafting
It's the best way to make money and anything you'll need in this world.

The crafting is based on a tree, with raw resources at the bottom. Almost every block has a recipe,
that is based on those raw resources. There are two main types of raw materials: crystal shards and ore.
You can process them into generic materials and capsules:

- Generic materials are alloyed metal meshes and crystal circuits. They can be used to make anything basic.
- Advanced materials are capsules. They are specific and needed for the more advanced recipes.

Element.Translation:
Você também pode construir o bloco de fábrica básica com as ferramentas do seu traje.

A fábrica básica também pode criar a refinaria de cápsulas, assim como a fábrica intermediária para 
construções mais elaboradas. Há ainda uma fábrica avançada, que por sua vez, é produzida
na fábrica intermediária.

Caso não possua um bloco de energia para alimentar suas fábricas você poderá usar sua ferramenta de fornecimento de energia
para alimentá-la, assim você poderá fazer alguns blocos em emergências. Isso é o que vamos fazer agora: produzir um bloco
de energia a partir do zero!
Element.Original:
You can produce the basic factory block with your suit's tools as well.

The basic factory makes the capsule refinery as well as the standard factory for
more advanced crafting. There is even an advanced factory, which in turn is produced
in the standard factory.

Should you not have a power block for your factories, you can use your power supply tool to power
it, so you can make a few blocks in emergencies . That's what we are going to do now: Produce a power
block from scratch!

Element.Translation: Jump Drives are the portable version of structures that enable players to warp. You can put them on a ship, charge them up, and instantly travel up to 8 sectors. The destination to jump can be influenced in two ways. Either you jump in the direction you were looking at when engaging the jump drive, or you can use a more precise method. Entering a waypoint in the navigation panel will enable you to jump towards it no matter in which direction you look. It even puts you directly at your waypoint sector if it is fewer than 8 sectors away. Jump Drives can be placed like any other weapon or effect. They will appear in the weapon panel to put in the hotbar for use. Keep in mind that there is a sweet spot for jump Drive modules. You can build them as small as you want, but they will take much longer to charge the up. Placing more blocks than the sweet spot will make charging even faster, if you want a specialized jump ship. But keep the escalating power costs in mind. To charge, you have to hold the left mouse button like shooting a weapon. After it is charged, you can press right click to jump. The mechanic to actively have to charge up the Jump Drive is in place to make it more dangerous to use in battle. The drive has a small 10 second cooldown after jumps. But be warned, changing the blocks on a jump drive will reset the charge immediately. The charge will also be reset if hit, so make sure you are safe before starting to charge up (you can still of course do it while flying).
Element.Original: Jump Drives are the portable version of structures that enable players to warp. You can put them on a ship, charge them up, and instantly travel up to 8 sectors. The destination to jump can be influenced in two ways. Either you jump in the direction you were looking at when engaging the jump drive, or you can use a more precise method. Entering a waypoint in the navigation panel will enable you to jump towards it no matter in which direction you look. It even puts you directly at your waypoint sector if it is fewer than 8 sectors away. Jump Drives can be placed like any other weapon or effect. They will appear in the weapon panel to put in the hotbar for use. Keep in mind that there is a sweet spot for jump Drive modules. You can build them as small as you want, but they will take much longer to charge the up. Placing more blocks than the sweet spot will make charging even faster, if you want a specialized jump ship. But keep the escalating power costs in mind. To charge, you have to hold the left mouse button like shooting a weapon. After it is charged, you can press right click to jump. The mechanic to actively have to charge up the Jump Drive is in place to make it more dangerous to use in battle. The drive has a small 10 second cooldown after jumps. But be warned, changing the blocks on a jump drive will reset the charge immediately. The charge will also be reset if hit, so make sure you are safe before starting to charge up (you can still of course do it while flying).

Element.Translation:
Você pode minerar recursos manualmente, normal, mas é muito mais eficiente usar uma nave para isso
. Você também pode processar recursos com as ferramentas integradas no seu traje, porém, é muito melhor
fazer isto em um bloco de fábrica!

Especialmente no caso de processar recursos brutos, se você não usar um bloco de Refinaria de Cápsulas,
obterá menos materiais e não conseguirá nenhuma cápsula.
Element.Original:
You can mine resources by hand just fine, but it's a lot more efficient using a salvage ship.
Also, you can process raw resources with your tools embedded in your astronaut suit.
It's much more efficient to use a factory block for that though!

Especially when refining raw resources, you won't get any capsules and less generic materials
if you don't use the Capsule Refinery block for that.

Element.Translation: A thin metal alloy mesh. These blocks are byproducts of the ore refining process, combining less useful metals into a useable alloy that is then manufactured into a sturdy mesh block.
Element.Original: A thin metal mesh. These blocks are byproducts of the ore refining process, combining less useful metals into a useable alloy that is then manufactured into a sturdy mesh block.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: The Shield Capacitor is capable of generating a shield around the object it is attached to. While it is not affected by the tradition(Adjacent) grouping mechanism, they are affected by the non-traditional (Non-adjacent) grouping mechanism. Meaning that two Shield Capacitors next to each other, and two that are apart but attached to the same object, will have the same storage capacity. Shield Capacitors are dependant on Shield-Rechargers to replenish the special energy they use to project their shields.
Element.Original: The Shield Capacitor is capable of generating a shield around the object it is attached to. While it is not affected by the tradition(Adjacent) grouping mechanism, they are affected by the non-traditional (Non-adjacent) grouping mechanism. Meaning that two Shield Capacitors next to each other, and two that are apart but attached to the same object, will have the same storage capacity. Shield Capacitors are dependant on Shield-Rechargers to replenish the special energy they use to project their shields.

Element.Translation: The Salvage Module, when used in conjunction with a Salvage Computer, can create a basic but effective salvage/mining system. The Salvage Module fires a salvage beam in a straight line. Salvage Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their salvage speed. You can also choose which block outputs the beam by finding the Salvage Module you want to output the beam, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it. Salvage Modules can be used to Salvage parts from inactive or defeated Ships and Stations or mine Asteroids and Planets for resources.
Element.Original: The Salvage Module, when used in conjunction with a Salvage Computer, can create a basic but effective salvage/mining system. The Salvage Module fires a salvage beam in a straight line. Salvage Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their salvage speed. You can also choose which block outputs the beam by finding the Salvage Module you want to output the beam, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it. Salvage Modules can be used to Salvage parts from inactive or defeated Ships and Stations or mine Asteroids and Planets for resources.
