Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation:
Ali atrás você aprendeu sobre combinações. O NPC-03 acha que é um grande segredo, mas na verdade todo mundo sabe disso!

De fato, ele sequer sabre tudo sobre o assunto. Existe ainda um segundo sistema que você pode conectar nas armas
da mesma forma que você as combina: Efeitos!

Agora, você pode adicionar efeitos e utilizá-los individualmente, de modo defensivo, eles podem endurecer seu escudo,
Aumentar sua velocidade máxima e muito mais.

Você pode inclusive conectá-los a seu armamento para obter efeitos adicionais, como por exemplo penetração de escudos
ou mesmo gerar efeitos físicos, como puxar ou empurrar, assim será possível criar seu próprio raio trator!

Ah sim, mais uma dica: Você pode colorir o projétil das suas armas ao conectar uma luz colorida nelas. Simples assim!
Element.Original:
You learned about combinations back there. NPC-03 thinks it's such a secret, but in reality everybody knows it!

In fact, he doesn't even know everything about it. There is actually a second system you can connect to your weapons
in the same way you are combining weapons: Effects!

Now, you can place effects and use them as a defensive standalone system, they can harden your shields,
increase top speed and much more.

You can also connect them to your weapons, which then will give that weapon an effect amongst others like armour efficiency, power drain
and even physical effects like push, pull, and stop, so you can make your very own tractor beam!

Oh and one last tip: You can colour your weapon projectiles or beams by connecting a coloured light to them. Easy as that!

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.

Dessa forma a energia dos reatores principais serão transferidas para o funcionamento do reator de defesas.

Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: Fragmentos cintilantes de Mattise refletem tanta luz que eles até parecem brilhar. Várias tecnologias são baseadas no uso destes fragmentos após seu refino.
Element.Original: Glittering Mattise Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Do you really want to leave/forefeit?

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Você realmente quer cancelar esta corrida?
Element.Original: Do you really want to remove this race?

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: multiplica a quantidade de itens criados depois da destruição de uma AI. utilize valores inferiores a 1 para menos e 0 para nenhum
Element.Original: multiply amount of items spawned after AI destruction. use values smaller 1 for less and 0 for none

Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: Up to how many blocks should be produced (0 for unlimited)?

Element.Original: How fast NPC fleet ships are compared to their max speed when loaded

Element.Translation: Blindagem com faixa de segurança amarela 1/2

Element.Original: Strength depends on the amount of linked modules, you can switch firing modes with your Right Click.

Element.Original: Planet size standard deviation. Note: normal gaussian distribution graph scaled horizontally by 1/3 (min 0)

Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: Impossível iniciar uma corrida neste setor!\nNão há competidores!
Element.Original: A Race in this sector cannot be started!\nNo Racers!

Element.Translation: Uma corrida foi iniciada neste setor!
Element.Original: A race started in this sector!

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: When a system block gets taken out, the integrity of all systems will be temporarily protected and stay at the value they had before damage\nto prevent rapid integrity decline in a battle, when the inital system was built with good integrity.\nProtection cancels when a block gets added.
Element.Original: When a system block gets taken out, the integrity of all systems will be temporarily protected and stay at the value they had before damage\nto prevent rapid integrity decline in a battle, when the inital system was built with good integrity.\nProtection cancels when a block gets added.

Element.Translation: Enables the ability to store multiple charges of your Jump Drive.\n\r
Element.Original: Enables the ability to store multiple charges of your Jump Drive.\n\r

Element.Translation: multiplicador geral para todas as minerações
Fazer cópia de segurança do mundo quando migrar para um novo formato de arquivo
Element.Original: Back up world when migrating to a new file format

Element.Translation: Rampa de placa mãe de Hylat
Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: WARNING: Shield matrix is currently disrupted!\nUnable to stop any damage.
Element.Original: WARNING: Shield matrix is currently disrupted!\nUnable to stop any damage.

Element.Translation: Material de alta tecnologia capaz de melhorar ainda mais a estrutura de blocos de armadura básica. Isto cria uma armadura avançada.
Element.Original: High-Tech Material capable of further enhancing the structure of standard armor blocks. This creates advanced armor.

Element.Translation:
Eu te ensinei tudo que sei.
Fale com o NPC-3 para os próximos passos do tutorial!

Tenha um bom dia!
Element.Original:
I've taught you everything I know.
Talk to NPC-3 for the next steps in the tutorial!

Have a good tick!

Element.Translation:
Se você colocar um computador de canhão ou qualquer outro controlador em uma nave, ele se conectará automaticamente
ao núcleo. Logo após posicionar um computador, cada cano de canhão será automaticamente conectado a ele,
a não ser que você selecione outra coisa.

Vá em frente, tente fazer. Eu vou lhe dar um computador e alguns canos. Primeiro, posicione o computador e em seguida,
coloque os canos. Assim que estiver satisfeito pressione 'T' para abrir o painel de armamento.
Element.Original:
If you place a cannon computer or any other controller on a ship, it is automatically connected to the
core. After you place a computer, each cannon barrel is automatically linked, unless you select
something else.

Go ahead, give it a shot. I'll give you a computer and some barrels. Place the computer first and then
place the barrels. After you're happy with it, press 'T' to open the weapons panel.

Element.Translation:
Por sorte, nas naves, caso você os coloque na ordem correta,
não será necessário fazer as conexões manualmente!
Element.Original:
Luckily on ships, if you put them down in the right order, you
won't have to do any manual connecting at all!

Element.Translation:
O feixe de reciclagem lhe permite coletar blocos e minerar a partir de uma distância segura
Ele é mais rápido do que a coleta manual dos blocos, e sua eficiência aumenta com seu tamanho.

O canhão laser é sua arma básica e também tem o dano proporcional ao seu tamanho.
Você também mode modificá-lo para se comportar como uma shotgun ou uma metralhadora.
Eu te explico como isso funciona daqui a pouco.
Element.Original:
The salvage beam lets you take blocks and mine minerals from a safe distance.
It's also much faster than picking up those blocks by hand, and will increase efficiency with salvage beam size.

The laser cannon is your basic defence and does more damage the bigger it is.
You can also make different versions of it, like a shotgun or a machine gun type.
I'll explain how that works later.

Element.Translation:
Muito bem %s, você aprende rápido!
Agora, vamos aprender como as armas e os outros sistemas funcionam nas naves.
Existem diversas opções de armas, assim como diversos sistemas adicionais,
os mais importantes são o feixe de reciclagem e o canhão laser.
Element.Original:
Well done %s, you are a fast learner!
Now, let's check out how weapons and other systems work on ships.
There are several weapons to choose from, as well as several systems,
most importantly the salvage beam and the laser cannon.

Element.Translation:
Eu vou te dar um núcleo, alguns módulos de energia e um de propulsão.
Pra criar o núcleo é só apertar 'X' e dar um nome. Certifique-se de que tem espaço
suficiente na sua frente, então não olhe para o chão ao fazer isso.

Espere só um minutinho para que eu remova esta nave pré-fabricada pra você.
Element.Original:
I will give you a core, a few power modules and a thruster.
To spawn that core, just press 'X' and name it. Be sure there is enough space
in front of you, so don't look at the ground while doing this.

Let me remove this pre-made ship real quick for you.

Element.Translation:
Uma nave precisa de pelo menos 2 sistemas para funcionar: Energia e Propulsão.
Coloque ambos na sua nave e você conseguirá voar.
Tenha em mente que quanto mais módulos de propulsão você colocar mais
energia precisará e mais rápido você irá acelerar!
Element.Original:
A ship needs two essential systems to be usable: Power and Thrust.
Place both types on your ship and you will be able to fly.
Keep in mind, the more thrust modules you place, the more power you will need
and the faster you'll accelerate!

Element.Translation:
Existem várias formas de conseguir uma nave. Comprar uma do catálogo de diagramas,
roubar ou derrotar uma, ganhar de presente ou mesmo construir uma você mesmo!
Você pode construir tantas quanto quiser!
Um bom construtor pode construir naves que derrotem quaisquer outras naves do mesmo tamanho,
porém, vamos começar pelo básico.
Element.Original:
There are various ways to acquire a ship. Buy one from the blueprint catalogue,
steal one, defeat one, get one as a gift, and of course build one yourself!
You can build as many as you like!
A good ship builder can construct ships that dominate any other ship of equal size,
but let's start with the basics.

Element.Translation:
Ah %s, você chegou!
Eu sou "NPC-02"!

Agora que você já sabe como pilotar uma nave, irei ensiná-lo como construir uma.
Element.Original:
Ah %s, you made it!
I'm "NPC-02"!

Now that you know how to fly a ship, I will teach you how to build one.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Shields: %s / %s (%s s/sec); RegenBlocks: %s; CapacityBlocks %s; Power Needed: %s e/sec
Element.Original: Shields: %s / %s (%s s/sec); RegenBlocks: %s; CapacityBlocks %s; Power Needed: %s e/sec

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Cubatoms of pure crystaline Parseen float suspended within this capsule.
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure crystaline Parseen float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: Câmara de Reator para melhorar a logística.\n\rPrecisa estar fisicamente conectada a um Reator de Energia usando blocos de Conduíte de Reator.
Element.Original: Reactor Chamber to enhance logistics.\n\rNeeds to be physically connected with a Power Reactor by using Reactor Conduit blocks.

Element.Translation: Câmara de Reator para melhorar as capacidades de furtividade.\n\rPrecisa estar fisicamente conectada a um Reator de Energia usando blocos de Conduíte de Reator.
Element.Original: Reactor Chamber to enhance stealth capabilities.\n\rNeeds to be physically connected with a Power Reactor by using Reactor Conduit blocks.

Element.Translation: Impossível construir mais! Capacidade máxima atingida
Habilita o uso permanente da sua Unidade Furtiva ao custo de sempre consumir energia.
Element.Original: Enables permanent usage of your Stealth Drive at the cost of always consuming power.

Element.Translation: Aprenda o básico sobre movimentação e construção.
Element.Original: Learn the basics of moevement and building.

Element.Translation: Blocos de luz são uma maneira excelente de prover iluminação para a área.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: Proteja sua nave ao adicionar escudos.
Element.Original: Protect your ship by adding shields.

Element.Translation: Construa rápido e mais facilmente com as ferramentas avançadas.
Element.Original: Faster and easier building with advanced build tools.

Element.Translation: Aprenda como adicionar propulsão em sua nave.
Element.Original: Learn how add thrust for your ship.

Element.Translation: Aprenda a criar fonte de energia para uma estrutura.
Element.Original: Learn how to build power supply for a structure.

Element.Translation: The rail speed controller is used to manipulate the speed of your rails. Place it down and connect from it to all the rails that should be controlled. Using shift+V in build mode will add all touching rail blocks in the same direction. Then connect any number of activation blocks from the rail speed controller. The number of active blocks in opposition to the number of inactive blocks determines the speed percentage. So 5 active and 5 inactive is 50% of max speed, the same as 100 active and 100 inactive
Element.Original: The rail speed controller is used to manipulate the speed of your rails. Place it down and connect from it to all the rails that should be controlled. Using shift+V in build mode will add all touching rail blocks in the same direction. Then connect any number of activation blocks from the rail speed controller. The number of active blocks in opposition to the number of inactive blocks determines the speed percentage. So 5 active and 5 inactive is 50% of max speed, the same as 100 active and 100 inactive

Element.Translation: Expulsar jogadores que construirem diagramas modificados
Element.Original: Kick players that spawn modified blueprints

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Preparei uma nave para você atrás daquela porta!\nVocê pode entrar com \'R\'
Element.Original: I prepared a ship for you behind that door!\nYou can enter it with 'R'

Element.Translation: Existem dois modos:\n- Modo de construção, para construir uma nave eficientemente\n- e Modo de Voo, para poder voar com sua nave e usar suas armas
Element.Original: There are two modes:\n- Build Mode, to efficiently build a ship\n- Flight Mode, to fly your ship and fire weapons

Element.Translation: Beleza! Agora você está no modo de construção do navio!
Element.Original: Great! You are now in build mode of the ship!

Element.Translation: A StarMade Server Instance is already running on port %s
Element.Original: A StarMade Server Instance is already running on port %s

Element.Translation: Let\'s see if you can make\nyour way over to NPC-02 over on the\nother side of this area
Element.Original: Let's see if you can make\nyour way over to NPC-02 over on the\nother side of this area

Element.Translation: Uma placa mãe, manufaturada com Jisper.
An error occurred creating the index database!\nPlease sent an error report!
Element.Original: An error occurred creating the index database!\nPlease sent an error report!

Element.Translation:
Ótimo, nas laterais você agora pode ver as barras
 de condição da sua nave. 
Além disso, lembre-se de que maior a nave, mais ela demorará
 para virar.
Element.Original:
Great, on the sides you now see your ship's status
bars.
Also keep in mind that the bigger a ship is, the longer
it will take to turn.

Element.Translation: An error occurred creating the index database!\nPlease sent an error report!
Element.Original: An error occurred creating the index database!\nPlease sent an error report!

Element.Translation: Agora mude para o Modo de Voo ao pressionar\n a barra de espaço.
Element.Original: Switch now to flight mode by pressing\nthe space bar.

Element.Translation: Você também pode rearranjá-los ou colocar novas\narmas na sua barra de atalhos a partir do menu\nde armamento, ao pressionar \'$WEAPON_PANEL\'
Element.Original: You can also rearrange them, or\nassign new weapons to your hotbar\nin the weapons menu by pressing '$WEAPON_PANEL'

Element.Translation:
Press $FORWARD $BACKWARDS $STRAFE_LEFT $STRAFE_RIGHT and $UP $DOWN to use your thrusters.
Use Left Shift to slow down.
With the mouse wheel and number keys you can
select your weapon or tool from the hot bar.
There are 10 hotbars for weapons. Hold control
and mouse wheel scroll through them, or press
contol + number key to switch directly.
Element.Original:
Press $FORWARD $BACKWARDS $STRAFE_LEFT $STRAFE_RIGHT and $UP $DOWN to use your thrusters.
Use Left Shift to slow down.
With the mouse wheel and number keys you can
select your weapon or tool from the hot bar.
There are 10 hotbars for weapons. Hold control
and mouse wheel scroll through them, or press
contol + number key to switch directly.

Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: Left click to activate/open.\nRight click to deactivate/close.
Element.Original: Left click to activate/open.\nRight click to deactivate/close.

Element.Original: (Press %s to switch to FLIGHT MODE; press %s to exit structure)

Element.Original: A canister of green paint, used in various recipes.

Element.Translation: Módulo de efeito de pulso eletromagnético

Element.Translation: This is the basic rail module. As a single block this module works like a docking module. You can put more of them together to make a track. Use the \'Rail Docker\' to dock to this block.
Element.Original: This is the basic rail module. As a single block this module works like a docking module. You can put more of them together to make a track. Use the 'Rail Docker' to dock to this block.

Element.Translation:
Race gate modules must form a 1 block deep loop to create a working Race Gate. 
To link your Race Gate controller to its Race Gates, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Link multiple Race Gates with each other to create a Race Track. Right click the destination Gate with a Marker Beam tool and then left click the source Gate with it.
To create a race on your Race Track. Go to gate you want as starting position and open its Gate Controller Menu. Press the “Create new race” button and fill in the details.

After that anyone can join the created list by clicking on it and pressing “Join Race”, you can also remove the race with the “Remove Race” button. 

When all racers are ready, link an activation controller or button to the starting gate’s controller. Sending a true signal will start the race. Every racer will see a marker which gate to go through first.
Element.Original:
Race gate modules must form a 1 block deep loop to create a working Race Gate. 
To link your Race Gate controller to its Race Gates, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Link multiple Race Gates with each other to create a Race Track. Right click the destination Gate with a Marker Beam tool and then left click the source Gate with it.
To create a race on your Race Track. Go to gate you want as starting position and open its Gate Controller Menu. Press the “Create new race” button and fill in the details.

After that anyone can join the created list by clicking on it and pressing “Join Race”, you can also remove the race with the “Remove Race” button. 

When all racers are ready, link an activation controller or button to the starting gate’s controller. Sending a true signal will start the race. Every racer will see a marker which gate to go through first.

Element.Translation: Nome do jogador dentro do jogo
quão exato a AI mira (quanto mais alto o valor mais preciso será em distâncias maiores. 10 = aproximadamente 99% de precisão a 10m)
Element.Original: how accurate the AI aims (the higher the value the more accurate vs distance. 10 = about 99% accuracy at 10m)

Element.Translation: Rampa de placa mãe de Threns

The Cannon Barrel, when used in conjunction with a Cannon Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Cannon fires a simple projectile in a straight line. Cannons do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the projectile by finding the Cannon Barrel you want to output the shot, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.
Element.Original: The Cannon Barrel, when used in conjunction with a Cannon Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Cannon fires a simple projectile in a straight line. Cannons do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the projectile by finding the Cannon Barrel you want to output the shot, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: The Shield Supply Computer is required for creating functioning Shield Supply systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Shield Supply Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Element.Original: The Shield Supply Computer is required for creating functioning Shield Supply systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Shield Supply Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Shield Supply Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Shield Supply Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: The Docking Enhancer can be used to increase the size of the Docking Zone created by a Docking Module. To use them, simply connect them to the Docking Module whose zone you want to increase by selecting the Module with C, and then using V to connect each Enhancer. As with Weapons, and other blocks that can be connected. The Docking Enhancers do not have to be adjacent to the Docking Module. Alternatively, you can lay a Docking Module down, select it with C, and then each Docking Enhancer you put down afterwards will be automatically connected to the Docking Module. As of now, there is no need to orient Docking Enhancers, as they will increase the Docking Zone all around, no matter which way they are facing, or where they are put in correlation to the Docking Module.
Element.Original: The Docking Enhancer can be used to increase the size of the Docking Zone created by a Docking Module. To use them, simply connect them to the Docking Module whose zone you want to increase by selecting the Module with C, and then using V to connect each Enhancer. As with Weapons, and other blocks that can be connected. The Docking Enhancers do not have to be adjacent to the Docking Module. Alternatively, you can lay a Docking Module down, select it with C, and then each Docking Enhancer you put down afterwards will be automatically connected to the Docking Module. As of now, there is no need to orient Docking Enhancers, as they will increase the Docking Zone all around, no matter which way they are facing, or where they are put in correlation to the Docking Module.

A logic gate is an idealized or physical device implementing a Boolean function; that is, it performs a logical operation on one or more logical inputs, and produces a single logical output. This module will send \"on\" only if at least one logic module connected to it is \"on\".
Element.Original: A logic gate is an idealized or physical device implementing a Boolean function; that is, it performs a logical operation on one or more logical inputs, and produces a single logical output. This module will send "on" only if at least one logic module connected to it is "on".

Element.Original: A conduit to connect a group of Reactor Power blocks to a Chamber.\n\r\n\rIt automatically connects chambers <-> chambers or chamber <-> reactor, when the touching conduit blocks are in physical contact with both groups.

Element.Translation:
Race gate modules must form a 1 block deep loop to create a working Race Gate. 
To link your Race Gate controller to its Race Gates, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Link multiple Race Gates with each other to create a Race Track. Right click the destination Gate with a Marker Beam tool and then left click the source Gate with it.
To create a race on your Race Track. Go to gate you want as starting position and open its Gate Controller Menu. Press the “Create new race” button and fill in the details.

After that anyone can join the created list by clicking on it and pressing “Join Race”, you can also remove the race with the “Remove Race” button. 

When all racers are ready, link an activation controller or button to the starting gate’s controller. Sending a true signal will start the race. Every racer will see a marker which gate to go through first.
Element.Original:
Race gate modules must form a 1 block deep loop to create a working Race Gate. 
To link your Race Gate controller to its Race Gates, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Link multiple Race Gates with each other to create a Race Track. Right click the destination Gate with a Marker Beam tool and then left click the source Gate with it.
To create a race on your Race Track. Go to gate you want as starting position and open its Gate Controller Menu. Press the “Create new race” button and fill in the details.

After that anyone can join the created list by clicking on it and pressing “Join Race”, you can also remove the race with the “Remove Race” button. 

When all racers are ready, link an activation controller or button to the starting gate’s controller. Sending a true signal will start the race. Every racer will see a marker which gate to go through first.

Element.Translation:
You can use this system to upgrade your weapons or to use defensively on your ship.

To link your Controller to its Modules, press %s on the Controller, then %s on the individual modules, 
or alternatively Shift + $CONNECT_MODULE to mass select grouped modules.

Afterwards you can link it to a weapon by connecting the weapon controller you want to upgrade
with the effect controller you just made.
You can do this manually with $SELECT_MODULE and $CONNECT_MODULE or in the Weapons Menu.


Effect:
%s

Note that for the full effect, 
you need to connect 1:1 in size. 
The amount of linked modules of your effect has to be the same amount of your weapon.

If not used linked to a weapon, 
the system has a defensive effect you can enable
Place the computer on your hotbar in the Weapons Menu
and activate it:
Element.Original:
You can use this system to upgrade your weapons or to use defensively on your ship.

To link your Controller to its Modules, press %s on the Controller, then %s on the individual modules, 
or alternatively Shift + $CONNECT_MODULE to mass select grouped modules.

Afterwards you can link it to a weapon by connecting the weapon controller you want to upgrade
with the effect controller you just made.
You can do this manually with $SELECT_MODULE and $CONNECT_MODULE or in the Weapons Menu.


Effect:
%s

Note that for the full effect, 
you need to connect 1:1 in size. 
The amount of linked modules of your effect has to be the same amount of your weapon.

If not used linked to a weapon, 
the system has a defensive effect you can enable
Place the computer on your hotbar in the Weapons Menu
and activate it:

This controller can be connected to other weapons

to customize your weapon.

To link your Controller to its Modules, press %s on the Controller, then %s on the individual modules, 
or alternatively Shift + $CONNECT_MODULE to mass select grouped modules.

Afterwards you can link it to another weapon by connecting the weapon controller you want to upgrade
with the weapon controller you just made.
You can do this manually with $SELECT_MODULE and $CONNECT_MODULE or in the Weapons Menu.

Note that for the full effect, 
you need to connect 1:1 in size.
Element.Original:
This controller can be connected to other weapons
and systems (cannon, beam, damage pulse, missile)
to customize your weapon.

To link your Controller to its Modules, press %s on the Controller, then %s on the individual modules, 
or alternatively Shift + $CONNECT_MODULE to mass select grouped modules.

Afterwards you can link it to another weapon by connecting the weapon controller you want to upgrade
with the weapon controller you just made.
You can do this manually with $SELECT_MODULE and $CONNECT_MODULE or in the Weapons Menu.

Note that for the full effect, 
you need to connect 1:1 in size.

Element.Translation: This is the rail rotation module. Whatever goes on to it will rotate by default 90 degrees, and then move on in the given direction if there is another rail block to go to. The degree of rotation can be modified by connecting activation blocks. Connect from the rail rotator up to 9 activation blocks. Each active block will add 45 degrees to its rotation. So it is possible to dynamically change the rotation by just activating and deactivating the activation blocks. Nine active blocks will result in a constant rotation.
Element.Original: This is the rail rotation module. Whatever goes on to it will rotate by default 90 degrees, and then move on in the given direction if there is another rail block to go to. The degree of rotation can be modified by connecting activation blocks. Connect from the rail rotator up to 9 activation blocks. Each active block will add 45 degrees to its rotation. So it is possible to dynamically change the rotation by just activating and deactivating the activation blocks. Nine active blocks will result in a constant rotation.

Acoplando a um bloco como esse, puxara todos os objetos dos cofres que estão conetados a esse bloco e passará os objetos para os cofres que estão conectados ao trilho de carregamento da nave a acoplar. Docking to a block like this will pull items from the chests that are connected to the rail docker of the docked ship to the chests that are connected to this rail block. Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Você pode entrar nele pressionando 'R', assumindo o controle da nave.

You can enter the core by pressing 'R', and take control of the ship.

Element.Translation:
Eu te ensinei tudo que sei.
Fale com o NPC-02 para os próximos passos do tutorial!

Tenha um bom dia!
Element.Original:
I've taught you everything I know.
Talk to NPC-02 for the next steps in the tutorial!

Have a good time!

Element.Translation:
O número de blocos não é tudo que importa, a arquitetura e o projeto também são importantes na eficácia
e eficiência de cada estrutura no StarMade.

Por enquanto vamos falar apenas sobre Naves.
Element.Original:
Block count is not all that matters, the architecture and design also has an important role on the effectiveness
and efficiency of every structure in StarMade.

For now we are only talking about Ships.

Element.Translation:
Toda nave tem um núcleo. O núcleo é o coração da nave e sem ele uma nave não
vai funcionar, então, certifique-se de protegê-lo a qualquer preço.

O núcleo também funciona como o painel de controle da sua nave,
então tenha isso sempre em mente ao projetá-la.
Element.Original:
Every ship has a core. A core is the heart of a ship, and without it the ship will not
function, so be sure to protect it at any cost.

Additionally the core block will serve as your vessel's point of control,
so be sure you keep that in mind when building.

Element.Translation:
Saudações %s, Eu sou "NPC-01"!

Eu vou te ensinar sobre uma das coisas mais importantes no universo de StarMade: Naves!
Element.Original:
Greetings %s, I'm "NPC-01"!

I will teach you about one of the most important things in the StarMade Universe: Ships!

Element.Translation: Zoom com a Roda do Mouse:
Yellow Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with black caution stripes.
Element.Original: Yellow Standard Armor that has been emblazoned with black caution stripes.

Element.Translation:
The sensor blocks is used to check the condition of a linked system.
It requires a touching activation block which will be used as output.
It also requires a block linked to the sensor to trigger a check. A clock that periodically sends a signal to the sensor is recommended.

Link the sensor to any of these blocks:
- power reactors
- power auxiliaries
- shields
- doors/force fields
- radar jammer
- cloaker
- jump drive
- cargo

The sensor has a default state of 0%. Meaning that it will trigger for blocks in an "off" state or for systems that are depleted such as 0 power or 0 volume used.

You can link the sensor to a number of activation modules to set any % other than 0. It works like a rail speed controller using ratios. 3 true linked activation modules out of 6 will set it to 50%.
Element.Original:
The sensor blocks is used to check the condition of a linked system.
It requires a touching activation block which will be used as output.
It also requires a block linked to the sensor to trigger a check. A clock that periodically sends a signal to the sensor is recommended.

Link the sensor to any of these blocks:
- power reactors
- power auxiliaries
- shields
- doors/force fields
- radar jammer
- cloaker
- jump drive
- cargo

The sensor has a default state of 0%. Meaning that it will trigger for blocks in an "off" state or for systems that are depleted such as 0 power or 0 volume used.

You can link the sensor to a number of activation modules to set any % other than 0. It works like a rail speed controller using ratios. 3 true linked activation modules out of 6 will set it to 50%.

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.

Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Isso conclui o tutorial de Sistemas de Armas.\nObrigado por ler, e obrigado por jogar\nStarMade!
Element.Original: This concludes the Weapon System Tutorial.\nThanks for reading, and thanks for playing\nStarMade!

Element.Translation: Entre novamente na sua nave com \'$ACTIVATE\'.
Pressione \'$CHANGE_SHIP_MODE\' para entrar no modo de construção novamente.
Element.Original: Press '$CHANGE_SHIP_MODE' to enter build mode again.

Element.Translation: Aumenta a velocidade máxima da sua nave.
Element.Original: Increases the top speed of your ship.

Element.Translation: Coloque o computador de canhão agora.\n(clique com o botão esquerdo)
Element.Original: Place the cannon computer now.\n(left click)

Element.Translation: Bom trabalho! Veja que agora ele possui uma borda\npiscando em laranja em volta. Isto indica\nque está atualmente selecionado.
Element.Original: Good work! You see that it now has an orange\npulsating border around it. That means it's\ncurrently selected.

Element.Translation:
Place some 'cannon barrel modules' now. You can place them
all next to each other for a single, high-damage
beam, or place them separate from one another to
shoot multiple projectiles at once.
Element.Original:
Place some 'cannon barrel modules' now. You can place them
all next to each other for a single, high-damage
beam, or place them separate from one another to
shoot multiple projectiles at once.

Element.Translation: Agora, posicione os canos dos canhões na sua nave.\n(clique com o botão esquerdo)
Element.Original: Now, place the cannon barrels on your ship.\n(left click)

Element.Translation: Bom trabalho. A única coisa que falta é vincular\n seu novo canhão no painel de armamento.
Element.Original: Great work. The only thing left is to assign\nyour new cannon in the weapon panel.

Element.Translation: Abra seu painel de armamento com \'$WEAPON_PANEL\'\n(somente acessível de dentro da nave)
Element.Original: Open your weapons panel with '$WEAPON_PANEL'\n(only accessible in a ship)

Element.Translation:
Este é o painel de armamento!
Você pode colocar os controles na sua barra
de atalhos a partir daqui, também poderá
gerenciar os armamentos integrados avançados.
Element.Original:
This is the weapon panel!
You can assign controllers to your
hotbar here, as well as manage
advanced combined weapons.

Element.Translation: Drag the cannon computer on top\nin the first (1) slot of your hotbar\nat the bottom
Element.Original: Drag the cannon computer on top\nin the first (1) slot of your hotbar\nat the bottom

Element.Translation: When new weapons are added, you will open\nthis menu to assign weapons to each slot in\nyour hotbar.
Element.Original: When new weapons are added, you will open\nthis menu to assign weapons to each slot in\nyour hotbar.

Element.Translation: Almost done. Now switch\ninto flight mode with \'Space\'\nif you aren\'t already.
Element.Original: Almost done. Now switch\ninto flight mode with 'Space'\nif you aren't already.

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Incrível! você já pode fechar seu painel de armamento.\n(pressione \'$WEAPON_PANEL\' ou clique no X)
Element.Original: Awesome! You can now close the weapon\npanel. (Press '$WEAPON_PANEL' or click on the X)

Element.Translation:
Você está pronto! Agora você pode selecionar
sua arma pressionando '1'
ou selecioná-la com a roda do mouse
caso já não esteja selecionada
Element.Original:
You're done! You can now select
your weapon by pressing '1'
or select it with the mouse wheel
if it isn't selected already

Element.Translation: Makes factories more efficient by increasing the number of production lines active during each factory cycle.
Element.Original: Makes factories more efficient by increasing the number of production lines active during each factory cycle.

Element.Translation: The Beacon provides an easily seen flare of brightness.
Element.Original: The Beacon provides an easily seen flare of brightness.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation:
Basic enhancement for the Short Range Scanner. When the Scanner is active, it provides extra information of all nearby entities.
Your scanner strength versus the stealth strength of your target, decides how much information you receive and what it counters of a Stealth Drive.

- Disables cloak
- Disables jamming
- Weapon group information
- Chamber group information
- Reactor group information

If enabled on the server, this chamber will also enable the Short Range Scanner on your structure. 
Otherwise it's already available.
Element.Original:
Basic enhancement for the Short Range Scanner. When the Scanner is active, it provides extra information of all nearby entities.
Your scanner strength versus the stealth strength of your target, decides how much information you receive and what it counters of a Stealth Drive.

- Disables cloak
- Disables jamming
- Weapon group information
- Chamber group information
- Reactor group information

If enabled on the server, this chamber will also enable the Short Range Scanner on your structure. 
Otherwise it's already available.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Enables the Jump Inhibitor.

When enabled, it prevents any ship with a reactor level equal or less than the inhibitor's strength, to not function..

Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: The Power Drain Module, when used in conjunction with a Power Drain Computer, can create a basic but effective power transfer system. The Power Drain Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Power Drain Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Power Drain Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.
Element.Original: The Power Drain Module, when used in conjunction with a Power Drain Computer, can create a basic but effective power transfer system. The Power Drain Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Power Drain Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Power Drain Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: Welcome to the Crafing Tutorial.\nIt will explain StarMade\'s\ncrafting and factory system.

Element.Translation: A type of vegetation covered in sharp spines.
Element.Original: A type of vegetation covered in sharp spines.

Element.Translation:
A shipyard has several features. To access them, just hit ‘R’ (Activate/Open) on the shipyard, and press the “Place Order” Button.
Here you can choose from several commands depending on the shipyard’s current state (e.g. if a ship is docked or not)

The Shipyard computer must be linked to both Shipyard Modules and exactly one Core Anchor to function.
Link the computer and modules using C and V.
Element.Original:
A shipyard has several features. To access them, just hit ‘R’ (Activate/Open) on the shipyard, and press the “Place Order” Button.
Here you can choose from several commands depending on the shipyard’s current state (e.g. if a ship is docked or not)

The Shipyard computer must be linked to both Shipyard Modules and exactly one Core Anchor to function.
Link the computer and modules using C and V.

Element.Translation: This is a decorative elecrical panel with screens.
Element.Original: This is a decorative elecrical panel with screens.

Element.Translation: Rampa de circuito ativo de Bastyn
O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: The Turret Docking Enhancer can be used for the Turret Docking Module, much like the Docking Enhancer can be for the Docking Module. To use them, you must simply connect them to the Turret Docking Module whose zone you want to increase by selecting the Unit with C, and then using V to connect each Enhancer. As with Weapons, and other blocks that can be connected. The Turret Docking Enhancers do not have to be adjacent to the Turret Docking Module. Alternatively, you can lay a Turret Docking Module down, select it with C, and then each Turret Docking Enhancer you put down afterwards will be automatically connected to the Turret Docking Module. As of now, there is no need to orient Turret Docking Enhancer, as they will increase the Docking Zone all around, no matter which way they are facing, or where they are put in correlation to the Turret Docking Module.
Element.Original: The Turret Docking Enhancer can be used for the Turret Docking Module, much like the Docking Enhancer can be for the Docking Module. To use them, you must simply connect them to the Turret Docking Module whose zone you want to increase by selecting the Unit with C, and then using V to connect each Enhancer. As with Weapons, and other blocks that can be connected. The Turret Docking Enhancers do not have to be adjacent to the Turret Docking Module. Alternatively, you can lay a Turret Docking Module down, select it with C, and then each Turret Docking Enhancer you put down afterwards will be automatically connected to the Turret Docking Module. As of now, there is no need to orient Turret Docking Enhancer, as they will increase the Docking Zone all around, no matter which way they are facing, or where they are put in correlation to the Turret Docking Module.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.

Element.Original: stop logic of objects that activate more than x blocks at once. They will enter a logic cooldown of 10 seconds to prevent servers from overloading

Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Simples de criar, Bastões de Luz são uma forma fácil de adicionar alguma iluminação à área.
Element.Original: Simple to create, Light Rods are an easy way to add some lighting to the area.

Element.Translation: Provides asteroid or planet plate resource information in the target panel when scanned.
Element.Original: Provides asteroid or planet plate resource information in the target panel when scanned.

Element.Translation: Este é o módulo da pista de carga. Acoplando a um bloco como esse, puxara todos os objetos dos cofres que estão conetados a esse bloco dos cofres que estão conectados ao trilho da nave a acoplar. Você pode colocar mais desses trilhos para fazer uma pista. Use o acoplador de trilhos para atracar a esse bloco.
Element.Original: This is the load rail module. Docking to a block like this will push items from the connected chests of this rail block to the chests that are connected to the rail docker of the docked ship. You can put more of them together to make a track. Use the 'Rail Docker' to dock to this block.

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation:
Se você clicar em 'Criar nova entrada' o jogo irá salvar
 sua nave atual em comando em um catálogo.
Como administrador ou durante o modo um jogador você pode
 também usar o comando '/save nomedanave' no chat
para salvar naves e até estações (estações não serão
listadas mas podem ser carregadas com o comando '/load')
Element.Original:
If you click on 'Create new entry' the game will save
your current entered ship into the catalog.
As admin or during singleplayer you can
also use the command '/save nameofship' in chat
to save ships and even stations (stations will not
be listed but can be loaded with the '/load' command)

Element.Translation:
'Salvar em catálogo local' só é relevante
em multijogador, ele não salvará a nave
o catálogo do servidor, mas no seu
catálogo de um jogador.
Element.Original:
'Save in local catalog' is only relevant
in multiplayer, it will not save the ship
in the server's catalog but in your local
singleplayer catalog.

Element.Translation:
Você também pode subir seus diagramas locais para o servidor
assim você pode comprá-los lá.
Tanto você como os admins do servidor terão acesso a eles,
então veja se você não se importaria com isso.
Element.Original:
You can also upload your local blueprints to the server
so you can buy them on it.
You and the server admins will have access to it,
so be sure you are OK with that.

Element.Translation:
As entradas do catálogo tem permissões
que determinam quem pode gerá-los: outros(todos)/facção/base inicial.
Há uma quarta opção 'inimigo utilizável' para administradores ou em modo um jogador para
fazer aparecer uma nave para os piratas e o guilda de comércio.
Element.Original:
Catalog entries have permissions
that determine who can spawn them: others(everyone)/faction/homebase.
There is a fourth option 'enemy usable' for admins or in singleplayer to
make a ship spawnable for pirates and the trading guild.

Element.Translation:
O catálogo mantém uma lista dos diagramas das naves.
Quando salvar um diagrama no modo um jogador eles aparecerá
 na sua pasta "StarMade lueprints".
Quando salvá-lo no servidor ele aparecerá na
pasta do dono do servidor.
Element.Original:
The catalog keeps track of ship blueprints.
When saving a blueprint in singleplayer they will appear
in your StarMade/blueprints folder.
When you save them on a server they will appear
in the server owner's folder.

Element.Translation: Olá, espero que aproveite sua estadia neste mundo!\nEle tem muito a oferecer.
Element.Original: Hi, I hope you enjoy your stay in this world!\nIt has a lot to offer.

Element.Translation: Modifies the permissions needed to use blocks normally locked by faction modules. When connected to a module, it shuts off the faction member requirement needed to activate that block.
Element.Original: Modifies the permissions needed to use blocks normally locked by faction modules. When connected to a module, it shuts off the faction member requirement needed to activate that block.

Element.Translation: Configuração de empuxo e aplicação de velocidade 1
Blocos de luz são uma maneira excelente de prover iluminação para a área.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: A pearlescent crystal composite. These blocks are byproducts of refining crystal shards, combining extranious substrates into versatile crystal lattices that are then melded into a useful crystal block.
Element.Original: A pearlescent crystal composite. These blocks are byproducts of refining crystal shards, combining extranious substrates into versatile crystal lattices that are then melded into a useful crystal block.

Element.Translation: Primeiro, você precisa consertar esta conexão para mim. Este canhão deveria disparar\nautomaticamente, porém, eles não estão conectados.
Element.Original: First, you need to fix this connection for me. This cannon should fire automatically,\nbut they are not linked.

Element.Translation:
(ADMIN) Exception:
%s
physics inconsistency detected (dif)
Performing cleanup on object to recover...
Element.Original:
(ADMIN) Exception:
%s
physics inconsistency detected (dif)
Performing cleanup on object to recover...

Element.Translation:
Então, se você posicionar um Computador de Canhão (o controlador),
os canos de canhão (módulos) conectados a ele irão disparar quando você utilizá-lo!

É o computador que controla todos os canhões como sendo um objeto só, pela barra de atalhos.
Element.Original:
So if you place a Cannon Computer (the controller) down,
the cannon barrels (modules) that are connected to it will fire when you use the controller!

It's the computer that controls the cannons as one object on the quick bar.

Element.Translation:
É assim que funciona:
Quase todos os blocos funcionais vem em dois tipos: Controladores e módulos.

Cada módulo de uma estrutura é utilizado por meio do controlador ao qual está conectado.
Element.Original:
Here's how it works:
Almost all functional blocks come in two types: A controller and modules.

Each module on a structure is used by the controller it is connected to.

Element.Translation:
Agora, este é o sistema que todo mundo está usando: O sistema de Controlador!
Entender este sistema é fundamental para criar qualquer coisa funcional neste mundo!
Element.Original:
Now this is the system everyone in our universe is using: the controller system!
Understanding this system is the key to make anything functional in this world!

Element.Translation:
SERVER ERROR
Double character update
detected:
%s
Please send in server logs.
Element.Original:
SERVER ERROR
Double character update
detected:
%s
Please send in server logs.

Element.Translation:
Eis aqui alguns dos exemplos mais comuns:

- Um 'Computador de Canhão' secundário aumentará a velocidade de disparo.
- Um 'Computador de Míssil' secundário aumentará o número de projéteis simultâneos.
- Um 'Computador de Raio Destruidor' aumentará o dano / velocidade do projétil.
- Um 'Computador de Pulso Destruidor' vai aumentar o dano causado.

Existem várias combinações.

Eu vou preparar lá uma demonstração para você! Vamos transformar este canhão em uma shotgun.
Element.Original:
Here are some of the most common examples:

- A 'Cannon Computer' slave will increase firing speed.
- A 'Missile Computer' slave will fire more projectiles.
- A 'Damage Beam Computer' will increase range and/or speed.
- A 'Damage Pulse Computer' will increase the damage dealt.

There are a lot of combinations.

I prepared an example for you over there! We are going to turn this cannon into a shotgun.

Element.Translation:
(ADMIN) Exception:
%s
physics inconsistency detected (miss)
Performing cleanup on object to recover...
Element.Original:
(ADMIN) Exception:
%s
physics inconsistency detected (miss)
Performing cleanup on object to recover...

Element.Translation:
É assim que funciona:

Se você tiver dois computadores, cada um conectado a seus respectivos módulos,
você pode interligar estes dois computadores para criar uma potente combinação de armas.

Você não poderá disparar ambas separadamente, mas ao invés disso, terá uma só mais poderosa

Dependendo da arma que você colocar como secundária, o efeito resultante será diferente.
Element.Original:
This is how it works:

If you have two computers with each having their own connected modules, you can actually link
those two computers together to create a powerful combination weapon.

You forfeit the ability to fire both weapons separately for a single, more powerful weapon

Depending on which weapon system you "slave" to another, the results will differ.

Element.Translation:
CLIENT ERROR
Double character update
detected:
%s
Please restart and send in logs.
Element.Original:
CLIENT ERROR
Double character update
detected:
%s
Please restart and send in logs.

Element.Translation:
Esta informação lhe dará uma vantagem sobre seu oponente, então preste atenção:

Como você deve ter percebido, quando voou naquelas naves lá trás, o canhão laser possui
um tempo longo de recarga. Na verdade, tem um jeito de mudar isso!
E o melhor é que você pode aplicar o mesmo princípio para qualquer arma que encontrar.
Element.Original:
This information can give you an edge over your opponent, so listen closely:

As you may have noticed when you flew those ships back there, the laser cannon has a fairly
long reload time. There is actually a way to change that!
And the best thing is, you can apply the same knowledge to any other weapon out there.

Element.Translation:
Oi! Bem vindo a aula avançada!

O NPC-02 me contou que você já construiu sua primeira nave!
Isso é realmente impressioanete!
Element.Original:
Hello there! Welcome to the advanced class!

I've heard from NPC-02 that you have already built your first ship!
That's really impressive!

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: This is a decorative elecrical panel.
Element.Original: This is a decorative elecrical panel.

Element.Translation:
Changes your shield density to take less damage from low damage weapons.
This makes the shield more vulnerable to high damage weapons though.

Efficient against fast firing weapons.
Element.Original:
Changes your shield density to take less damage from low damage weapons.
This makes the shield more vulnerable to high damage weapons though.

Efficient against fast firing weapons.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: This is a rail docking module. It is used to dock to a basic rail, a rail rotator, or a Rail Turret Axis. The arrow on its top side works like a magnet aligning itself with the arrow on the block you are docking to. For each docker you can set a docking beam from within your weapon panel. There is no restriction to the size and mass in docking, except overlapping areas are not allowed.
Element.Original: This is a rail docking module. It is used to dock to a basic rail, a rail rotator, or a Rail Turret Axis. The arrow on its top side works like a magnet aligning itself with the arrow on the block you are docking to. For each docker you can set a docking beam from within your weapon panel. There is no restriction to the size and mass in docking, except overlapping areas are not allowed.

Element.Original: Increases the recharge speed of your Jump Drive.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateE
Element.Translation:
The game will decide between FFA or Team Deathmatch
by looking at the player count in each faction.
The mode with the most players will be chosen.
Press '$LEADERBOARD' to see the Battle Mode leaderboard.
Element.Original:
The game will decide between FFA or Team Deathmatch
by looking at the player count in each faction.
The mode with the most players will be chosen.
Press '$LEADERBOARD' to see the Battle Mode leaderboard.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateD
Element.Translation: To battle, the players have to join a\nspecific faction: Team factions or the FFA faction.
Element.Original: To battle, the players have to join a\nspecific faction: Team factions or the FFA faction.

Element.Translation:
Optional Block to direct the energy stream 
between your stabilizer and a main reactor.

Connect the nodes to create a path. The stream will
enter from the main reactor to the closest starting
point, and go from the end point to the stabilizer.
Element.Original:
Optional Block to direct the energy stream 
between your stabilizer and a main reactor.

Connect the nodes to create a path. The stream will
enter from the main reactor to the closest starting
point, and go from the end point to the stabilizer.

Element.Translation:
Bem-vindo ao Tutorial de IA. 
O tutorial ensinará você sobre
a funcionalidade de IA em StarMade
e como utilizá-la.
Element.Original:
Welcome to the AI Tutorial.
This tutorial will teach you about
the AI functionality in StarMade
and how to use it.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateB
Element.Translation:
In StarMade, building and
gathering resources takes time,
Battle Mode lets people duel in a
death match or team battle without having
to worry about the rest.
Element.Original:
In StarMade, building and
gathering resources takes time,
Battle Mode lets people duel in a
death match or team battle without having
to worry about the rest.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateC
Element.Translation:
Admins can enable Battle Mode by editing
the server.cfg file.
If the "Use_Personal_Sectors" option is set to 'true',
each player will have its own sector he cannot leave,
but he will be provided with an infinite shop that
never runs out of supplies nor requires credits to use,
allowing you to build a PVP ship.
Element.Original:
Admins can enable Battle Mode by editing
the server.cfg file.
If the "Use_Personal_Sectors" option is set to 'true',
each player will have its own sector he cannot leave,
but he will be provided with an infinite shop that
never runs out of supplies nor requires credits to use,
allowing you to build a PVP ship.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateA
Element.Translation:
Battle Mode is a sub-mode for StarMade
as a simple test for future modes.
It essentially turns the game into a
arcade fighter.
Element.Original:
Battle Mode is a sub-mode for StarMade
as a simple test for future modes.
It essentially turns the game into a
arcade fighter.

Element.Translation: Blocos de luz são uma maneira excelente de prover iluminação para a área.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: Estes Módulos podem ser usados para criar portas que podem ser abertas ou fechadas pelo jogador, feixes de ancoragem, e sistemas lógicos. Múltiplos blocos adjacentes contam como uma única porta. Significa que ativar uma ativa todas as que estão em volta dela. Muito útil para criar portas de grandes dimensões. Pressione $ACTIVATE para Abrir\Fechar.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: The Turret Docking Module functions very similarly to the Docking Module. Except that it allows the docked item to freely rotate, thus enabling turret capabilites. All the other rules and limitations of the Docking Module still apply. You can orient the block and thus the zone, and there must be no other blocks than the docked item in the zone.
Element.Original: The Turret Docking Module functions very similarly to the Docking Module. Except that it allows the docked item to freely rotate, thus enabling turret capabilites. All the other rules and limitations of the Docking Module still apply. You can orient the block and thus the zone, and there must be no other blocks than the docked item in the zone.

Element.Translation: Aumenta a quantidade de dano absorvido da armadura.
Element.Original: Increases the amount of damage your armor blocks can withstand from any kinetic based damage.

Element.Translation: Modifies the permissions needed to use blocks normally locked by a certain faction rank. When connected to a module, it shuts off the faction rank requirement needed to activate that block.
Element.Original: Modifies the permissions needed to use blocks normally locked by a certain faction rank. When connected to a module, it shuts off the faction rank requirement needed to activate that block.

Element.Translation: The Push Pulse Computer is required for creating functioning Push Pulse systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Push Pulse Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Push Pulse Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Push Pulse Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
Element.Original: The Push Pulse Computer is required for creating functioning Push Pulse systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Push Pulse Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Push Pulse Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Push Pulse Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: Simples de criar, Bastões de Luz são uma forma fácil de adicionar alguma iluminação à área.
Element.Original: Simple to create, Light Rods are an easy way to add some lighting to the area.

Element.Translation: Dias de inatividade antes que um fundador possa expulsar outro fundador
Element.Original: Days of inactivity after which a founder may kick another founder

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: restringir construção/remoção para a área do assistente
Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Por favor, informe o nome do seu diagrama!
Element.Original: Please enter in a name for your blueprint!

Element.Translation: Deve conter apenas letras, números ou (_-)!
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Enviar um Diagrama a um servidor multijogador
Salvar localmente a partir do servidor multijogador
Element.Original: Save from multiplayer server as local

Element.Translation: Por favor, escolha um nome e classificação para seu projeto!
Element.Original: Please choose a name and classification for your blueprint!

Element.Translation: Permite a armazenar com mais capacidade as várias cargas do seu Thrust Blast.
Element.Original: Enables the ability to store multiple charges of your Thrust Blast.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Reduz o dano recebido pelo bloco por estar muito perto de uma estrela.
Element.Original: Increases the amount of damage your armor blocks can withstand from any heat based damage.

Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: Relatively cheap and easy to make, Glass allows clear exterior views, however it has little in the way of durability when shot.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.

Element.Translation: Este bloco produz resultados aleatórios quando ativado. Cada vez que recebe qualquer sinal (true ou false) muda seu estado por uma chance de 50: 50.
Element.Original: This block produces random results when activated. Each time it receives any signal (true or false) it changes it’s state by a 50:50 chance.

Element.Translation: Agarramento\n(clique com o botão direito para ver)
Lança Mísseis\n(clique com direito para ver)
Rampa de circuito ativo de Varat
Rifle Sniper\n(clique com direito para ver)
Feixe Demarcador\n%s\n(clique com o botão direito para ver)
Feixe de Fornecimento de Energia\n(clique com o botão direito para ver)
Element.Original: Power Supply Beam\n(right click to view)

Element.Translation: The Power Supply Module, when used in conjunction with a Power Supply Computer, can create a basic but effective power transfer system. The Power Supply Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Power Supply Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Power Supply Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.
Element.Original: The Power Supply Module, when used in conjunction with a Power Supply Computer, can create a basic but effective power transfer system. The Power Supply Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Power Supply Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Power Supply Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
