Element.Translation:
Depois de você ter colocado uma fábrica grande você verá
que ela precisa de energia para funcionar. Você pode fornecer
esta energia ao disparar com seu próprio feixe de fornecimento
de energia ou, caso você possua, colocando blocos de carregador
de energia. Se você não tiver quaisquer carregadores deverá
concentrar-se em criar alguns em sua nova fábrica.
Element.Original:
After you placed a macro factory you will see
that it needs power to function. You can provide
that power by shooting it with your personal power
supply beam, or if you have them, placing down
power recharge blocks. If you don't have any power blocks
then it should focus to craft some in your new factory.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation:
Copiou o catálogo de outro universo?

Pressionar "cancelar" não vai deletar seus diagramas, mas todos os itens
do catálogo terão suas permissões zeradas (proprietário, uso por inimigos, etc.).
Element.Original:
Copy catalog from another world?

Pressing cancel will not delete your blueprints,
but all catalog entries will reset their permissions (owner, pirate usable, etc).

Element.Translation:
Warning: Your reactor stabilization is less than 50%. This negatively impacts the performance of your reactor, and causes extra damage to your reactor when it is hit.

Place some stabilizers a distance away from your main reactor to increase your stabilization.
The minimal distance is determined by the size of your main reactor. If you plan on building the stabilizers closer, you will need to place more of them.
Element.Original:
Warning: Your reactor stabilization is less than 50%. This negatively impacts the performance of your reactor, and causes extra damage to your reactor when it is hit.

Place some stabilizers a distance away from your main reactor to increase your stabilization.
The minimal distance is determined by the size of your main reactor. If you plan on building the stabilizers closer, you will need to place more of them.

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateJ
Element.Translation:
Open the macro factory with $ACTIVATE and click on
change production. You can use the filter and type
for example 'power' to quickly find power modules
in the drop down menu. After you chose the power recharge
module, you can click on graph to see exactly
what you need for making that block.
Element.Original:
Open the macro factory with $ACTIVATE and click on
change production. You can use the filter and type
for example 'power' to quickly find power modules
in the drop down menu. After you chose the power recharge
module, you can click on graph to see exactly
what you need for making that block.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateI
Element.Translation:
When you have either 20 metal meshes or circuits,
press on the 'craft macro' button to craft your first macro
factory. The macro factory makes every craftable
block in the game. You can only place this block
on a station or a planet.
Element.Original:
When you have either 20 metal meshes or circuits,
press on the 'craft macro' button to craft your first macro
factory. The macro factory makes every craftable
block in the game. You can only place this block
on a station or a planet.

Element.Translation: Você não é membro de nenhuma facção.\nVocê gostaria de redefinir este objeto como neutro?
Element.Original: You are not in any faction.\nDo you want to reset this object to neutral?

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateL
Element.Translation:
You can of course craft multiple factories
to do all these steps at once.
Furthermore you are able to link factories:
Press $SELECT_MODULE on the factory you want to be able
to take needed materials out for other factories and
press $CONNECT_MODULE on those to connect them with it.
Element.Original:
You can of course craft multiple factories
to do all these steps at once.
Furthermore you are able to link factories:
Press $SELECT_MODULE on the factory you want to be able
to take needed materials out for other factories and
press $CONNECT_MODULE on those to connect them with it.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateK
Element.Translation:
IMPORTANT: The factory will only do the last step
of the graph. Every step below that will require it's
own factory. In this example the only thing that
this factory will consume is Metal Mesh and
'Active Varat Processore', which you need to produce
in a separate factory (or change the production on this one).
Element.Original:
IMPORTANT: The factory will only do the last step
of the graph. Every step below that will require it's
own factory. In this example the only thing that
this factory will consume is Metal Mesh and
'Active Varat Processore', which you need to produce
in a separate factory (or change the production on this one).

Element.Translation: Por favor, desacople a nave primeiro,\ncaso contrário, a facção será sobrescrita!
Element.Original: Please undock this ship first, or\nfaction would be overwritten!

Element.Translation:
Colocar blocos em naves danificadas
pode gerar efeitos negativos!
Por favor, reinicie a nave antes de
colocar quaisquer blocos.
Element.Original:
Placing blocks on a damaged ship
can lead to negative effects!
Please reboot the ship before placing
any blocks.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateM
Element.Translation:
A factory will take ingredients needed from
all the factories that are connected to it.
This basically enables you to rebuild a whole
crafting tree. Then you can put in raw resources
in the bottom and get the high level product on the top.
Element.Original:
A factory will take ingredients needed from
all the factories that are connected to it.
This basically enables you to rebuild a whole
crafting tree. Then you can put in raw resources
in the bottom and get the high level product on the top.

Element.Translation: Inteligência Artificial da entidade não carregada:\n
Você não possui tripulação neste slot.
Element.Original: You don't have crew in this slot.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Você só pode ter cinco\nconvites pendentes\nao mesmo tempo.
Element.Original: You can only have five\ninvitations pending\nat the same time.

Element.Translation: Por favor, conecte o bloco\nindicado pelo marcador!
Element.Original: Please connect the block\nthe marker is pointing to!

Element.Translation: Por favor, selecione o bloco\nindicado pelo marcador!
Element.Original: Please select the block\nthe marker is pointing to!

Element.Translation: Regenera sua armadura e HP lentamente ao longo do tempo, com o custo de consumo de energia extra.
Element.Original: Increases the amount of damage your armor blocks can withstand from any environmental based damage.

Element.Translation: Não é possível modificar: \nVocê não está em alguma facção!
Element.Original: Cannot modify:\nYou are not in any faction!

Element.Translation: Sua facção está corrompida\ne não existe mais!
Element.Original: Your faction is corrupted\nand does not exist!

Element.Translation: Insira o nome do jogador que deseja convidar
Element.Original: Enter Name of the player you want to invite

Element.Translation:
You can use different kinds of styles for your display block.
Use a header like <style></style> to select font and color
e.g. <style>c=#FF0000,f=1</style> -> red text with medium font size.
f=x (x can be 0,1,2 for font sizes)
c=x (x has to be a hex code for font (used in css/html) starting with #)


Variables that can be placed inside the text:
%s

If you place an activation block next to this block and connect that block
to another display, the content of that display will be replaced with this one.
There are several other methods to edit the content of the connected display:
* '[PASSWORD]text': The text in this block will not show up.
* '[ADD]text': The text after [ADD] is added to the existing text of the connected block ([ADD] must be in the very front)
* '[DEL]number': Removes an amount of characters from the connected block ([DEL] must be in the very front)
* '[REPLACEFIRST]regexp[WITH]replacement': use java conform regular expressions to replace specific text ([REPLACEFIRST] must be in the very front)
* '[REPLACEALL]regexp[WITH]replacement': use java conform regular expressions to replace specific text ([REPLACEALL] must be in the very front)

You can also use the sensor block to check if two display blocks have equal text content. Just connect the sensor block to two display blocks as input. The [password] tag is ignored when comparing text.
Element.Original:
You can use different kinds of styles for your display block.
Use a header like <style></style> to select font and color
e.g. <style>c=#FF0000,f=1</style> -> red text with medium font size.
f=x (x can be 0,1,2 for font sizes)
c=x (x has to be a hex code for font (used in css/html) starting with #)


Variables that can be placed inside the text:
%s

If you place an activation block next to this block and connect that block
to another display, the content of that display will be replaced with this one.
There are several other methods to edit the content of the connected display:
* '[PASSWORD]text': The text in this block will not show up.
* '[ADD]text': The text after [ADD] is added to the existing text of the connected block ([ADD] must be in the very front)
* '[DEL]number': Removes an amount of characters from the connected block ([DEL] must be in the very front)
* '[REPLACEFIRST]regexp[WITH]replacement': use java conform regular expressions to replace specific text ([REPLACEFIRST] must be in the very front)
* '[REPLACEALL]regexp[WITH]replacement': use java conform regular expressions to replace specific text ([REPLACEALL] must be in the very front)

You can also use the sensor block to check if two display blocks have equal text content. Just connect the sensor block to two display blocks as input. The [password] tag is ignored when comparing text.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateC
Element.Translation: The other system is using recipes.\nRecipes just determine fixed product lines.\nFor example: 10 of any ore capsule makes a meta mesh.
Element.Original: The other system is using recipes.\nRecipes just determine fixed product lines.\nFor example: 10 of any ore capsule makes a meta mesh.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateD
Element.Translation: Enough theory for now. Here is how you start\nwith absolutely nothing but your initial\npersonal power beam.
Element.Original: Enough theory for now. Here is how you start\nwith absolutely nothing but your initial\npersonal power beam.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateA
Element.Translation:
Crafting in StarMade is based on a "consistence" system.
Every craftable element has an amount of
other elements it is made from. These other
elements again have other elements they are
made off and so forth.
You can compare this system with a tree that has branches.
Element.Original:
Crafting in StarMade is based on a "consistence" system.
Every craftable element has an amount of
other elements it is made from. These other
elements again have other elements they are
made off and so forth.
You can compare this system with a tree that has branches.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateB
Element.Translation: Consistence trees do not loop, so\nan element (the tree\'s root) is never in any\nof the branches of its own crafting tree.
Element.Original: Consistence trees do not loop, so\nan element (the tree's root) is never in any\nof the branches of its own crafting tree.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateG
Element.Translation:
Put one type of shards or ores in it and leave
the second slot empty (the processed product will use this slot).
After a short time, you should be
getting a lot of capsules from that type.
Place those in your inventory.
Element.Original:
Put one type of shards or ores in it and leave
the second slot empty (the processed product will use this slot).
After a short time, you should be
getting a lot of capsules from that type.
Place those in your inventory.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateH
Element.Translation:
After you made some capsules, click on
the 'Micro' button in your inventory and place
them there. You need 10 capsules of any(!)
type to produce either metal meshes (ore capsules),
or circuits (shard capsules).
Those two are the base ingredients for most of
the blocks in StarMade.
Element.Original:
After you made some capsules, click on
the 'Micro' button in your inventory and place
them there. You need 10 capsules of any(!)
type to produce either metal meshes (ore capsules),
or circuits (shard capsules).
Those two are the base ingredients for most of
the blocks in StarMade.

Element.Translation: Increases the strength of your Jump Inhibitor.
Element.Original: Increases the strength of your Jump Inhibitor.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateE
Element.Translation:
StarMade's raw resources exist in two groups:
Crystal shards and ores. Each planet part
has two random resources, while the resources
on asteroids are set per type. You'll find
different types of asteroids depending on
the distance between the sector and the star.
Element.Original:
StarMade's raw resources exist in two groups:
Crystal shards and ores. Each planet part
has two random resources, while the resources
on asteroids are set per type. You'll find
different types of asteroids depending on
the distance between the sector and the star.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateF
Element.Translation:
To start, collect some raw ore by salvaging
some resources with a basic ship or as astronaut.
After you've done that, open your inventory with $INVENTORY_PANEL and click the
'Craft Capsule' button. This will open your personal
capsule factory. You can also craft a factory block
that is faster and more efficient.
Element.Original:
To start, collect some raw ore by salvaging
some resources with a basic ship or as astronaut.
After you've done that, open your inventory with $INVENTORY_PANEL and click the
'Craft Capsule' button. This will open your personal
capsule factory. You can also craft a factory block
that is faster and more efficient.

Element.Translation: Missile storage depleted!\nIncrease missile storage by placing missile capacity modules on your structure.
Element.Original: Missile storage depleted!\nIncrease missile storage by placing missile capacity modules on your structure.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: An advanced circuit that\'s manufactured from Varat crystals.
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Varat crystals.

Element.Translation: O minério de Zercaner possui uso industrial caso seja convertido para um estado mais manuseável. Várias tecnologias são baseadas no uso deste minério após seu refino.
Element.Original: Zercaner Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Original: A wedge of Parseen Crystal. It's white in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: Heptágono blindado com faixa de segurança verde
O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation:
Aumenta o percentual de Estabilização do seu Reator ativo. Este bloco perde a eficiência quanto mais próximo estiver do reator Ativo.
Cada tamanho de Reator (nível) tem uma distância ótima onde a eficiência da sua estabilização atinge um valor máximo.

Se sua Estabilização for muito baixa, você terá uma geração de energia reduzida.
O Reator e suas Câmaras também são altamente reativos, a menos que você tenha uma Estabilização de 100% ou mais.
Ao tomar dano, os componentes do seu Reator receberão danos adicionais por explosões internas.

É aconselhável ter mais de 100% de Estabilização para evitar danos extras quando em combate.
Element.Original:
Increases the Stabilization rating of your active Reactor. This block loses efficiency the closer it gets to the Active reactor.
Each Reactor size (level) has an optimal distance where the efficiency of your stabilization reaches a maximum value.

If your Stabilization is too low, you will have reduced power generation.
The Reactor and its Chambers are also highly reactive unless you have 100% or more Stabilization.
Upon taking damage, your Reactor components will take additional damage from internal explosions.

It's advised to have more than 100% Stabilization to avoid taking extra damage when in combat.

Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation:
Warning: There is no conduit block next to this chamber block to connect it to your reactor tree.
A chamber needs to be next to a line of conduit blocks to connect it to either the main reactor or to another group of chambers.

You can also add chamber blocks to existing groups of the same general type (e.g. adding stealth chambers to a group of cloak chamber blocks).

Chamber systems are structured like a tree: the tree trunk is the main reactor, and the branches connect the chambers with conduits.
Chamber blocks themselves can be placed next to each other of the same type to increase their size.
Element.Original:
Warning: There is no conduit block next to this chamber block to connect it to your reactor tree.
A chamber needs to be next to a line of conduit blocks to connect it to either the main reactor or to another group of chambers.

You can also add chamber blocks to existing groups of the same general type (e.g. adding stealth chambers to a group of cloak chamber blocks).

Chamber systems are structured like a tree: the tree trunk is the main reactor, and the branches connect the chambers with conduits.
Chamber blocks themselves can be placed next to each other of the same type to increase their size.

Element.Translation:
A conduit connects chambers to a main reactor, or to another chamber in the tree.

Build lines of conduits to create a tree between your chambers and your main reactor.
Then open the radial menu to access your reactor under ship/station -> reactor or press %s when looking at the reactor.
Element.Original:
A conduit connects chambers to a main reactor, or to another chamber in the tree.

Build lines of conduits to create a tree between your chambers and your main reactor.
Then open the radial menu to access your reactor under ship/station -> reactor or press %s when looking at the reactor.

Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Estes Módulos podem ser usados para criar portas que podem ser abertas ou fechadas pelo jogador, feixes de ancoragem, e sistemas lógicos. Múltiplos blocos adjacentes contam como uma única porta. Significa que ativar uma ativa todas as que estão em volta dela. Muito útil para criar portas de grandes dimensões. Pressione $ACTIVATE para Abrir\Fechar.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Isto conclui o Tutorial de Construção Avançada.\nObrigado pela leitura e obrigado por jogar\nStarMade!
Element.Original: This concludes the Advanced Build Tutorial.\nThanks for reading, and thanks for playing\nStarMade!

Element.Translation:
AVISO:
A infraestrutura desta estação está deteriorada.
Você não conseguirá pegar de volta os
blocos que colocar!
Element.Original:
WARNING
This station's infrastructure is decayed.
You won't be able to salvage the blocks
you placed!

Element.Translation: Nenhum elemento disponível para se construir!\nO slot selecionado está vazio!
Element.Original: No element available to build!\nSelected slot is empty!

Element.Original: Average diameter of resource veins in asteroids

Element.Original: No element available to build!\nSelected slot is empty!

Element.Translation:
INFORMAÇÃO:
Use a gravidade quando estiver do
lado de fora da nave. Olhe para um
módulo de gravidade e pressione %s.
Element.Original:
INFO:
Use gravity when you are
outside the ship. Look at
a gravity module and press %s.

Element.Translation: Relatively cheap and easy to make, Glass allows clear exterior views, however it has little in the way of durability when shot.
Element.Original: Relatively cheap and easy to make, Glass allows clear exterior views, however it has little in the way of durability when shot.

Element.Translation: Usar atalhos para percorrer outras hotbars

Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Blocos de luz são uma maneira excelente de prover iluminação para a área.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: You still have active trade requests.\nDo you want to cancel them and start a new one?
Element.Original: You still have active trade requests.\nDo you want to cancel them and start a new one?

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Uses a part of your Thrust (set in the the Thrust Configuration menu) to apply a force in the orientation of this block.\n\rWorks only within proximity of another block and gravity well.
Element.Original: Uses a part of your Thrust (set in the the Thrust Configuration menu) to apply a force in the orientation of this block.\n\rWorks only within proximity of another block and gravity well.

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Um lingote encravado de Zercaner refinado.
Element.Original: An wedged ingot of refined Zercaner.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateL
Element.Translation: As facções podem, em vez de declarar guerra contra uma facção inteira,\ndeclarar guerra contra um único jogador. Isso pode ser feito na\n guia \'Facção\' e clicando no botão \'Inimigos pessoais\'.
Element.Original: Factions can, instead of declaring war against a whole faction,\ndeclare war against a single player. This can be done in the\n'Faction' tab and clicking on the 'Personal Enemies' button.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateK
Element.Translation: In the future there will be a system that allows\nsome kind of faction war to deal with homebases.
Element.Original: In the future there will be a system that allows\nsome kind of faction war to deal with homebases.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateM
Element.Translation: Faction chat is also available by\nstarting a message with \'/f \' in chat,\nor by pressing shift+$CHAT to do that automatically.
Element.Original: Faction chat is also available by\nstarting a message with '/f ' in chat,\nor by pressing shift+$CHAT to do that automatically.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateH
Element.Translation:
You can also choose from several faction options:
'Public faction' makes it possible for players to
join without an invite. 'Declare war on hostile action'
will auto declare war when you faction is attacked.
'Consider neutral enemy' will change the relationship
with all faction-less entities to 'enemy'
Element.Original:
You can also choose from several faction options:
'Public faction' makes it possible for players to
join without an invite. 'Declare war on hostile action'
will auto declare war when you faction is attacked.
'Consider neutral enemy' will change the relationship
with all faction-less entities to 'enemy'

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateG
Element.Translation:
Você pode atribuir uma patente a um jogador ao clicar
em 'opções', ao lado do nome dele.
Neste menu de opções é possível ver todas as patentes
ou mesmo expulsar aquele jogador da facção.
Element.Original:
You can assign a rank to a player by clicking on 'options'
next to his name.
In that options menu you can see all ranks and
the ability to kick that person from your faction.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateJ
Element.Translation:
The same goes for a station, with the difference
that you can also make a station a faction's homebase.
Each faction can only have ONE homebase, as it has
a very big advantage: Homebases and everything docked
to it are invulnerable to damage.
Element.Original:
The same goes for a station, with the difference
that you can also make a station a faction's homebase.
Each faction can only have ONE homebase, as it has
a very big advantage: Homebases and everything docked
to it are invulnerable to damage.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateI
Element.Translation: In the faction hub, you can declare war\nand send peace/alliance offers by clicking on\nthe \'relation\' next to the faction\'s name.
Element.Original: In the faction hub, you can declare war\nand send peace/alliance offers by clicking on\nthe 'relation' next to the faction's name.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateD
Element.Translation:
In the "Faction" tab, you can manage your faction.
You can add a description and
write news posts. News will be visible for all
members of your faction. You can also accept peace
or alliance offers from other factions.
Element.Original:
In the "Faction" tab, you can manage your faction.
You can add a description and
write news posts. News will be visible for all
members of your faction. You can also accept peace
or alliance offers from other factions.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateC
Element.Translation:
To create a faction, click on 'Create new faction'
in the 'Personal' tab. Choose a name
and click OK. You can alternatively,
also accept an invite by clicking on 'Invites'.
Element.Original:
To create a faction, click on 'Create new faction'
in the 'Personal' tab. Choose a name
and click OK. You can alternatively,
also accept an invite by clicking on 'Invites'.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateF
Element.Translation:
Edição: Membros podem editar a descrição
ou postar notícias.
Expulsar: Membros podem expulsar jogadores de patentes inferiores.
Convidar: Membros podem convidar outros jogadores para a facção
Permissão de Edição: Somente dê isso aos lideres da facção,
já que isso dá permissão a eles para alterar as patentes.
Element.Original:
Edit: Members are able to edit description
and post news.
Kick: Members can kick players of a lower rank.
Invite: Members are allowed to invite players to the faction.
Permission-Edit: Only give this to faction leaders, as it enables
them to modify the ranks.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateE
Element.Translation:
Cada membro de sua facção tem uma patente.
Patentes podem ser nomeadas e suas permissões
podem ser definidas ao clicar no botão "Papéis".
Para mudar o nome de uma patente, clique nele.
Element.Original:
Each member of your faction has a rank.
Ranks can be named and their permissions
can be set when clicking the "Roles" button.
To change the name of a rank, click on the name.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateA
Element.Translation: Factions are a vital part of StarMade.\nPlayers can gather under 1 faction and work together\nto accomplish a common goal.
Element.Original: Factions are a vital part of StarMade.\nPlayers can gather under 1 faction and work together\nto accomplish a common goal.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateB
Element.Translation:
Press '$FACTION_MENU' to open the faction panel.
From here you can create and edit your own, or join an existing
faction. The 'Faction hub' tab shows you an overview
of all current factions in the game
and allows you to join a public faction.
Element.Original:
Press '$FACTION_MENU' to open the faction panel.
From here you can create and edit your own, or join an existing
faction. The 'Faction hub' tab shows you an overview
of all current factions in the game
and allows you to join a public faction.

Element.Original: Sertise Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Translation:
Shipyard Modules build the outer frame and define the usuable build-area of your shipyard.
After selecting your shipyard computer, place down an arc (U shape) of modules. Both end points have to be in line with each other.
Place down duplicate arcs to create a corridor. (The maximal distance from arc to arc is currently 32 blocks).
Element.Original:
Shipyard Modules build the outer frame and define the usuable build-area of your shipyard.
After selecting your shipyard computer, place down an arc (U shape) of modules. Both end points have to be in line with each other.
Place down duplicate arcs to create a corridor. (The maximal distance from arc to arc is currently 32 blocks).

Element.Original: enables or disables blueprint spawning from item

Element.Translation:
A fashionable helmet
to protect against the
dangers in space.

To put helmet on/off, place it in the action bar 
and activate it with LMB (with closed inventory)
Element.Original:
A fashionable helmet
to protect against the
dangers in space.

To put helmet on/off, place it in the action bar 
and activate it with LMB (with closed inventory)

Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: quanto maior, mais explosões serão executadas simultaneamente (custo total estimado em 20MB de RAM para cada, além, claro de CPU, pois o processo é em threads) (10 é o padrão para um jogador em um PC mediano)
Element.Original: the more the faster explosions at the same time are executed (costs in total about 20MB RAM each and of course CPU because it's all threaded) (10 is default for a medium powered singleplayer)

Element.Translation: Isto removerá naves que possuam blocos que não sejam normalmente permitidos (ex. blocos de estações espaciais em naves)
Element.Original: This will remove ships that have blocks that are normally disallowed (e.g. space station blocks on ships)

Element.Translation: se um diagrama carregado for inválido seu tipo será sobrescrito
Element.Original: If a loaded blueprint is invalid, it's type will be overridden

Element.Original: Days of inactivity after which a founder may kick another founder

Element.Original: Days of inactivity after a faction founder becomes kickable

Element.Original: Cost to repair a ship's armor at a shop

Element.Original: Ship armor repair cost per HP at shop

Element.Original: Cost to reboot a ship at a shop (per second it would take to reboot in space)

Element.Original: Charge needed per extra block over ratio

A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: se estiver ligado, o centro de massa será calculado com relação a massa dos blocos da estrutura. Se for \'falso\', o centro de massa será sempre calculado com base na posição do núcleo da nave
Element.Original: if on, the center of mass for each structured will be calculated based on block mass. On 'false', the center of mass is always the core position

Element.Translation: Impossível sentar-se nesta rampa\nna ausência de gravidade!
Element.Original: Can't sit on this wedge\nwithout gravity!

Element.Translation: Ship reboot cost per second at shop
Element.Original: Ship reboot cost per second at shop

Element.Translation: Só é possível sentar em cima!
naves e outras estruturas usam o sistema de hitpoints (pontos de vida). se desligado, a nave vai superaquecer quando o seu núcleo for destruído (antigo)
Element.Original: ships and other structures use the hitpoint system. if off, a ship will overheat when the core gets taken out (old)

Element.Translation: Só é possível sentar em cima!
Fragmentos cintilantes de Hattel refletem tanta luz que eles até parecem brilhar. Várias tecnologias são baseadas no uso destes fragmentos após seu refino.
Element.Original: Glittering Hattel Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: token de uplink, fornecido ao registrar-se em um servidor dedicado
Element.Original: uplink token, provided when registering a dedicated server

Element.Translation: Somente é possível sentar em blocos e rampas!

entity in this sector

Element.Original:
There is a cloaked/jamming
entity in this sector
but our signal isn't strong
enough to reveal it!
Do you really want to do this?

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: quão rápido skins devem ser transferidos entre o servidor e os clientes (muito alto pode causar lag) [padrão: 256 - aprox. 16kbps]
Element.Original: how fast should skins be transferred from server to clients (too high might cause lag) [default 256 ~ 16kb/s]

Element.Translation: A finely carved block of Cinnabar.
Element.Original: A finely carved block of Cinnabar.

Element.Translation: quantas estações são permitidas por setor
Element.Original: How many stations are allowed per sector

Element.Translation: quanto custa uma estação ou diagrama de estação
Element.Original: how much does a station or station blueprint cost

Element.Translation: parar logica de objetos que ativam mais que x blocos ao mesmo tempo. Eles entrarão em uma pausa de lógica por 10 segundos para prevenir sobrecarga nos servers
Element.Original: stop logic of objects that activate more than x blocks at once. They will enter a logic cooldown of 10 seconds to prevent servers from overloading

Element.Translation: Max logic activations at once per object stop
Element.Original: Max logic activations at once per object stop

Element.Translation: número de coordenadas que podem ser salvas por jogador
By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Não há nenhum projeto no inventário do estaleiro!
Descarrega o projeto atual.\nIsto também pode ser feito clicando com o botão direito no projeto.
Element.Original: Unloads the currently loaded design.\nThis can also be done by right-clicking on the design item.

Element.Translation:
Vem vindo ao Tutorial de Acoplamento.
Este tutorial irá explicar como construir
áreas de ancoragem e como acoplar naves
e torres
Element.Original:
Welcome to the Docking Tutorial.
This tutorial explains how to build
docking areas, and how to dock ships
and turrets

Element.Translation: Carregar um projeto preexistente.\nIsto também pode ser feito clicando com o botão direito no projeto.
Element.Original: Loads an existing design.\nThis can also be done by right-clicking on the design item.

Element.Translation: tamanho máximo da fila de rastreioamento lógico
Deve conter apenas letras, números ou (_-)!
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: Max logic activations at once per object warning
Element.Original: Max logic activations at once per object warning

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: avisar sobre objetos que ativam mais que x blocos ao mesmo tempo
Element.Original: warn about objects that activate more than x blocks at once

Element.Translation: Cria e carrega um projeto novo, colocando-o aqui.\nNo modo projeto você pode construir com todos tipos e formas de blocos.
Element.Original: Creates and loads a fresh design and places it here.\nIn design mode, you can build with any block type and amount.

Element.Translation: Max logic signal queue per object
Element.Original: Max logic signal queue per object

Element.Translation: multiplicador geral para todas as minerações
preço base mínimo que uma loja vai pedir, dependendo do estoque (ex. máximo de 80 créditos se o custo normal for 100)
Element.Original: minimum of base price a shop will want depending on its stock (e.g. max 80 credits if the normal cost is 100)

Element.Translation: preço base máximo que uma loja vai pedir, dependendo do estoque (ex. máximo de 120 créditos se o custo normal for 100)
Element.Original: maximum of base price a shop will want depending on its stock (e.g. max 120 credits if the normal cost is 100)

Element.Translation: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Jump Drive Charged!\nRight click to jump!
Element.Original: Jump Drive Charged!\nRight click to jump!

Element.Translation: No Jump Drive Modules Connected to this computer
Element.Original: No Jump Drive Modules Connected to this computer

Element.Translation: variação entre preços de compra e venda dependendo do estoque (os preços serão sempre os mesmos se for definido verdadeiro)
Element.Original: shop buy and sell price change depending on stock (shop prices will always stay the same if true)

Element.Translation: Asteroid types are distributed based on heat.
Element.Original: Asteroid types are distributed based on heat.

Element.Translation: There are other galaxies to explore!
Element.Original: There are other galaxies to explore!

Element.Translation: Piracy can be a worthwhile source of income.
Element.Original: Piracy can be a worthwhile source of income.

Element.Translation: Cara, eu realmente odeio usar os consoles desta estação! O material não é tão bom quanto os que\nvocê mesmo faz, além de ser muito mais barato...
Element.Original: Man, I really don't like using the consoles on this station! The hardware just isn't as good as on the\nstuff you build yourself, and it's cheaper too...

Element.Translation: It\'s often worth trying to befriend the neighbors.
Element.Original: It's often worth trying to befriend the neighbors.

Element.Translation: You can visit every star in the sky.
Element.Original: You can visit every star in the sky.

Element.Translation: Sensors can compare two Display Modules\' contents. Useful for passwords, commands, etc.
Element.Original: Sensors can compare two Display Modules' contents. Useful for passwords, commands, etc.

Element.Translation: Warp Gates allow instantaneous travel across vast distances.
Element.Original: Warp Gates allow instantaneous travel across vast distances.

Element.Translation: Winning a race and want to stay that way?\nUse turrets with the Stop effect!
Element.Original: Winning a race and want to stay that way?\nUse turrets with the Stop effect!

Element.Translation: Using Hull blocks in place of Armor allows decoration without the extra weight.
Element.Original: Using Hull blocks in place of Armor allows decoration without the extra weight.

Element.Translation: Jump Inhibitors are useful for ambushes.
Element.Original: Jump Inhibitors are useful for ambushes.

Element.Translation: Is something moving too quickly?\nUse a Stop effect weapon to help your aim.
Element.Original: Is something moving too quickly?\nUse a Stop effect weapon to help your aim.

Element.Translation: Fortress shields got you down?\nAdd an Ion effect to your weapons for shield-busting.
Element.Original: Fortress shields got you down?\nAdd an Ion effect to your weapons for shield-busting.

Element.Translation: Each Ship Core functions as the cornerstone of your ship, it also provides a basic amount of thrust, power generation, power capacity, as well as some shield capacity. Remember, always carry spare cores to avoid becoming marooned. Press $SPAWN_SHIP with a Ship Core anywhere in your inventory to place the core in the space in front of you. Press $ACTIVATE to Enter/Exit.
Element.Original: Each Ship Core functions as the cornerstone of your ship, it also provides a basic amount of thrust, power generation, power capacity, as well as some shield capacity. Remember, always carry spare cores to avoid becoming marooned. Press $SPAWN_SHIP with a Ship Core anywhere in your inventory to place the core in the space in front of you. Press $ACTIVATE to Enter/Exit.

Element.Translation: A block of Varat Crystal. It\'s blue in colour and emits a soft glow.
Element.Original: A block of Varat Crystal. It's blue in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation: If you don\'t have an Account yet, please go to www.star-made.org to create one
Element.Original: If you don't have an Account yet, please go to www.star-made.org to create one

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Scavengers may not care about style, but other players might.
Element.Original: Scavengers may not care about style, but other players might.

Element.Translation: You are safe within the boundaries of Trading Guild shops\n...provided they like you.
Element.Original: You are safe within the boundaries of Trading Guild shops\n...provided they like you.

Element.Translation: Blocos de luz são uma maneira excelente de prover iluminação para a área.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: Rotated Gravity Modules also influence their gravity direction.
Element.Original: Rotated Gravity Modules also influence their gravity direction.

Element.Translation: Larger ships are more powerful, but much harder to move.
Element.Original: Larger ships are more powerful, but much harder to move.

Element.Translation: Você não precisa estar conectado para jogar no um jogador ou multijogador
Element.Original: You don't have to be logged on to play single, or multiplayer

Element.Translation: A little decoration goes a long way.
Element.Original: A little decoration goes a long way.

Element.Translation: You may use Gravity Modules to construct gravity lifts!
Element.Original: You may use Gravity Modules to construct gravity lifts!

Element.Translation: Rails allow you to move (and rotate) portions of your ship or its interior.
Element.Original: Rails allow you to move (and rotate) portions of your ship or its interior.

Element.Translation: Rail Rotators are useful for decoration, too!
Element.Original: Rail Rotators are useful for decoration, too!

Element.Translation: Um lingote encravado de Threns refinado.
Element.Original: An wedged ingot of refined Threns.

Element.Translation: Sinalizador de Teletransporte\n%s\n(clique com o botão direito para ver)
pode derrubar as naves ou mísseis da própria facção
Element.Original: can shoot down own or missiles from own faction

Element.Translation: Opções padrão para diagramas ainda não estão presentes no catálogo
Element.Original: Default option for blueprints not in catalog yet

Element.Translation: usar o preço baseado nas receitas (o preço será a soma dos preços dos componentes necessários)
Element.Original: use recipe based prices (the price is the price of the parts it is made out of in crafting)

Element.Translation: O nome precisa ser um nome de arquivo válido
Element.Original: Name must be a legal file name

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: a carga será despejada a todo minuto se o estoque estiver acima da capacidade
Element.Original: cargo is ejected every minute if storage is at over capacity

Element.Translation: Unit Group Invalid! Must be a flat \'C\'-shape.
Element.Original: Unit Group Invalid! Must be a flat 'C'-shape.

Element.Translation: Escolha o banco de dados a ser importado

Uma chance a cada [esteValor] de uma região especial aparecer por faces de planetas (cidades, pirâmedes, etc.) (mudar este valor pode mudar algumas faces, mas não irá mudar nenhuma face que já tenha sido modificada por algum jogador)
Element.Original: one out of thisValue chance of a special region spawning per planet plate (cities, pyramids, etc) (changing this value migth change some plates, but won't change any plates that are already modified by a player)

Element.Translation: Quartéis generais ficam vulneráveis e podem ser atacados se aos Pontos de Facção forem negativos e a facção não possuir nenhum território
Element.Original: Home bases become attackable if a faction's Faction Points are in the minus and the faction doesn't own any territory

Element.Translation: Make homebase destructable on FP deficit
Element.Original: Make homebase destructable on FP deficit

Element.Translation: Chunk request thread pool size CPU
Element.Original: Chunk request thread pool size CPU

Element.Translation: Número de processos de CPU disponíveis para geração de chunks. ATENÇÃO: se for muito alto pode causar pico de CPU. Aproximadamente o mesmo número de núcleos do processador menos um é o ideal
Element.Original: Available threads of total for CPU generation. WARNING: too high can cause cpu spikes. About the amount of available cores minus one is best

Element.Translation:
#### Transmission Start
Base %s:
Hostile signs in %s...
Sending raiding party...
#### Transmission End
Element.Original:
#### Transmission Start
Base %s:
Hostile signs in %s...
Sending raiding party...

Element.Translation: Chunk request thread pool size total
Element.Original: Chunk request thread pool size total

Element.Translation: Por favor, insira um nome para seu Universo.
Element.Original: Please enter a name for your Universe.

#### Transmission Start
Target has fled...
Return to base...
#### Transmission End
Element.Original:
#### Transmission Start
Target has fled...
Return to base...
#### Transmission End

Element.Translation: Tamanho do thread para solicitações de chunks (a partir do disco e gerados)
Element.Original: Thead pool size for chunk requests (from disk and generated)

Element.Translation: Quantos blocos são enviados por update. Grupos grandes serão enviados mais rápido, porém, vão consumir mais banda e ficará vulnerável a Spam de jogadores
Element.Original: How many blocks are sent per update. Huge placements will shot faster, but it will consume more bandwidth and is subject to spamming players

Element.Translation: Você realmente quer excluir este universo
Element.Original: Do you really want to delete this universe

Element.Translation: How many cloaked ships have you found?
Element.Original: How many cloaked ships have you found?

Element.Translation: Each faction can have one homebase.\nEverything docked thereto is invulnerable.
Element.Original: Each faction can have one homebase.\nEverything docked thereto is invulnerable.

Element.Translation: O que mais está lá fora?
Jammers interfere with hostile AI\'s targeting abilities.
Element.Original: Jammers interfere with hostile AI's targeting abilities.

Element.Translation: Be careful when settling near Pirate stations.\nThey will continually hunt you down.
Element.Original: Be careful when settling near Pirate stations.\nThey will continually hunt you down.

Element.Translation: Você não pode estar em uma estrutura\npara participar deste tutorial.
Element.Original: You can't be in a structure\nto do this tutorial.

Element.Translation: The larger a missile\'s warhead, the higher its hitpoints.
Element.Original: The larger a missile's warhead, the higher its hitpoints.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Deve conter apenas letras, números ou (_-)!
Element.Original: Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: Por favor, digite um nome para sua nova Nave!
Element.Original: Please type in a name for your new Ship!

Element.Translation: Multiple buttons may toggle a single Flip-Flop (e.g. for light switches)
Element.Original: Multiple buttons may toggle a single Flip-Flop (e.g. for light switches)

Element.Translation: Delays can be chained to achieve longer delays.
Element.Original: Delays can be chained to achieve longer delays.

Element.Translation: Sensors used on thrusters can detect your speed, useful for engine decoration.
Element.Original: Sensors used on thrusters can detect your speed, useful for engine decoration.

Element.Translation: Decreases the power usage of your Scanner.
Element.Original: Decreases the power usage of your Scanner.

Element.Translation: As of June 1st, 2017, the StarMade Launcher consists of 10,688 lines of code.
Element.Original: As of June 1st, 2017, the StarMade Launcher consists of 10,688 lines of code.

Element.Translation: A cross-connected Delay and Not-Signal form a basic 0.5 second clock.
Element.Original: A cross-connected Delay and Not-Signal form a basic 0.5 second clock.

Element.Translation: A strange, alien type of vine.
Element.Original: A strange, alien type of vine.

Element.Translation: You can use Rail Speed Controllers to set rotation speeds.
Element.Original: You can use Rail Speed Controllers to set rotation speeds.

Element.Translation: Estes Módulos podem ser usados para criar portas que podem ser abertas ou fechadas pelo jogador, feixes de ancoragem, e sistemas lógicos. Múltiplos blocos adjacentes contam como uma única porta. Significa que ativar uma ativa todas as que estão em volta dela. Muito útil para criar portas de grandes dimensões. Portas de Explosão são significativamente mais duráveis que as tradicionais portas de Plex ou Vidro. Pressione $ACTIVATE para Abrir\Fechar.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: Embora desarmadas e com uma saúde média, a solução é criar uma armadura básica utilizando uma pequena quantidade de materiais básicos.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: You can copy one Display Module to another using buttons/activators
Element.Original: You can copy one Display Module to another using buttons/activators

Element.Translation: Sensors can detect the state of doors, useful for hangar/airlock indicators.
Element.Original: Sensors can detect the state of doors, useful for hangar/airlock indicators.

Element.Translation: Buttons/Activators copy adjacent rail types and orientations to the rails they are linked to.
Element.Original: Buttons/Activators copy adjacent rail types and orientations to the rails they are linked to.

Element.Translation: Força do Escudo de Reator 3 NÃO DISPONÍVEL
By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: ERRO:\nImpossível comprar!\nVocê não está próximo de uma loja!
Element.Original: ERROR:\nCannot buy!\nYou are not near a shop!

Element.Translation:
Você quer comprar este diagrama?
Isto vai colocá-lo no seu
inventário. Clique com o botão direito nele para
 fornecer os materiais necessários.
Element.Original:
Do you want to buy this blueprint?
This will put the blueprint in your
inventory. Right click on it to provide
the necessary materials.

Element.Translation: If you find a bug, report it on phab.starma.de!
Element.Original: If you find a bug, report it on phab.starma.de!

Element.Translation: As always, thank you for playing StarMade!\n ~ The Schine Team
Element.Original: As always, thank you for playing StarMade!\n ~ The Schine Team

Element.Translation: Holding [%s] displays the quick radial menu.
Element.Original: Holding [%s] displays the quick radial menu.

Element.Translation: modo de depuração (Só ative se souber o que está fazendo)
Element.Original: debug (don't activate unless you know what you're doing)

Element.Translation: The Docking Module allows the user to create a fixed Docking Zone. This Zone can then be Docked/Undocked with, by using the Ship Core\'s built-in Docking Beam. Docking Modules can be oriented, and must not have any obstructions in their Zone (The Green Box), other than the docked item in question. Otherwise, the Module will go offline, and no docking will be allowed until the obstruction is removed.
Element.Original: The Docking Module allows the user to create a fixed Docking Zone. This Zone can then be Docked/Undocked with, by using the Ship Core's built-in Docking Beam. Docking Modules can be oriented, and must not have any obstructions in their Zone (The Green Box), other than the docked item in question. Otherwise, the Module will go offline, and no docking will be allowed until the obstruction is removed.

Element.Translation: You may customize your controls from the options menu.
Element.Original: You may customize your controls from the options menu.

Element.Translation: Combine weapons to get different effects.
Element.Original: Combine weapons to get different effects.

Element.Translation: All weapons are balanced; use whichever fits your needs!
Element.Original: All weapons are balanced; use whichever fits your needs!

Element.Translation: Lock-on missiles (beam+missile) only rarely miss their targets.
Element.Original: Lock-on missiles (beam+missile) only rarely miss their targets.

Element.Translation: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) allows you to place multiple blocks at once.
Element.Original: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) allows you to place multiple blocks at once.

Element.Translation: In Advanced Build Mode ([%s]), the arrow points to the front of the ship.
Element.Original: In Advanced Build Mode ([%s]), the arrow points to the front of the ship.

Element.Translation: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) allows you to copy/paste.
Element.Original: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) allows you to copy/paste.

Element.Translation: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) symmetry planes reduce your work by up to 8x!
Element.Original: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) symmetry planes reduce your work by up to 8x!

Element.Translation: Pressing [%s] while in Build Mode gives you access to Advanced Build Mode.
Element.Original: Pressing [%s] while in Build Mode gives you access to Advanced Build Mode.

Element.Translation: Circuitry in StarMade is Turing-complete: you can make anything!
Element.Original: Circuitry in StarMade is Turing-complete: you can make anything!

Element.Translation: Activators and buttons adjacent to basic rails detect objects moving on that rail.
Element.Original: Activators and buttons adjacent to basic rails detect objects moving on that rail.

Element.Translation: You may specify names for Inner Ship Remotes, which will display on the hotbar.
Element.Original: You may specify names for Inner Ship Remotes, which will display on the hotbar.

Element.Translation: Heavy armor will protect you, but hinders mobility. Choose carefully.
Element.Original: Heavy armor will protect you, but hinders mobility. Choose carefully.

Element.Translation: Missiles may be destroyed with a well-placed shot.
Element.Original: Missiles may be destroyed with a well-placed shot.

Element.Translation: Point-defense turrets automatically fire at hostile missiles or astronauts.
Element.Original: Point-defense turrets automatically fire at hostile missiles or astronauts.

Element.Translation: Makes factories more efficient by increasing the number of production lines active during each factory cycle.
Element.Original: Makes factories more efficient by increasing the number of production lines active during each factory cycle.

Element.Translation: Beams are quite effective up close, but useless at a distance.
Element.Original: Beams are quite effective up close, but useless at a distance.

Element.Translation: Warheads may detonate if damaged. Use caution!
Element.Original: Warheads may detonate if damaged. Use caution!

Element.Translation: Blocos de luz são uma maneira excelente de prover iluminação para a área.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: Welcome to the Ship System Tutorial

Element.Translation: habilita ou desabilita criação a partir de diagramas
Element.Original: enables or disables blueprint spawning from item

Element.Translation: Não é possível vender uma pilha inteira de uma vez (ainda)\nClique com botão direito e divida a pilha primeiro.
Element.Original: Cannot sell a whole stack at once (yet)\nRight click and split it first.

Element.Translation: O processamento adicional da Armadura Padrão resulta em Armadura Avançada. Com uma composição muito mais densa, proporcionando maior saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de danos.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Processar Blocos de Cristal com Armadura Básica produz Armadura de Cristal. Com uma composição cristalina complexa, ela concede aumento de saúde e maiores propriedades de redução de dano.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Estes Módulos podem ser usados para criar portas que podem ser abertas ou fechadas pelo jogador, feixes de ancoragem, e sistemas lógicos. Múltiplos blocos adjacentes contam como uma única porta. Significa que ativar uma ativa todas as que estão em volta dela. Muito útil para criar portas de grandes dimensões. Portas de Explosão são significativamente mais duráveis que as tradicionais portas de Plex ou Vidro. Pressione $ACTIVATE para Abrir\Fechar.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: Activation Gates are capable of detecting an entity passing through it\'s Gate structure, sending a True signal to any Logic block linked to the Controller.. The gate must be a solid, 1 block deep ring structure linked to a Activation Gate controller. To link your Activation Gate Controller to the Activation Gate Module structure, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Element.Original: Activation Gates are capable of detecting an entity passing through it's Gate structure, sending a True signal to any Logic block linked to the Controller.. The gate must be a solid, 1 block deep ring structure linked to a Activation Gate controller. To link your Activation Gate Controller to the Activation Gate Module structure, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.

Element.Translation: Tolerância de modificação do ativador do diagrama (padrão = 10%)
Destino livre de portas de salto

The Pickup Point block will project a 3x3 detection sphere. When a ship\'s docking module enters that detection area, the entity will be guided to a Pickup Rail if applicable.\n\rShips will remember the last used Pickup Area modules they dock to and if they\'re part of a fleet, they\'ll return to them when the \"Carrier Recall\" order is issued. The flagship is where they\'ll try to return, multiple carriers per fleet is not allowed yet.
Element.Original: The Pickup Point block will project a 3x3 detection sphere. When a ship's docking module enters that detection area, the entity will be guided to a Pickup Rail if applicable.\n\rShips will remember the last used Pickup Area modules they dock to and if they're part of a fleet, they'll return to them when the "Carrier Recall" order is issued. The flagship is where they'll try to return, multiple carriers per fleet is not allowed yet.
When put right next to a Mine Core, the damage of the mine is increased.

Element.Translation: The Damage Beam Computer is required for creating functioning Damage Beam systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Damage Beam Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Damage Beam Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Damage Beam Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
Element.Original: The Damage Beam Computer is required for creating functioning Damage Beam systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Damage Beam Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Damage Beam Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Damage Beam Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
